a tasty, low-fat soup with a little kick that my family requests often. starting with au gratin potatoes makes it so easy. this recipe probably came from light and tasty magazine, although i substituted fat-free cheese and skim milk to make it lower in fat. This dish is named nacho potato soup. and it won´t take more than 30 minutes. It is composed of 6 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: au gratin potato mix, corn, tomatoes and green chilies, water, skim milk, fat free cream cheese, hot sauce, fresh parsley sprig. Follow this steps: in large pot , combine au gratin potato mix , tomatoes , and water, mix well and bring to a boil, reduce heat , cover , and simmer 15-18 minutes until potatoes are done, add cheese chunks and cook , stirring with a whisk , until the cheese melts, add milk , corn , and hot sauce , stirring until soup is hot, garnish with parsley

so tasty and relatively good for you.  i eat a square of it for breakfast with a little bit of yogurt and i feel spoiled!!  sometimes i use slightly less sugar (1/2 c)and it's still fabulous.  would also be good with a big scoop of vanilla ice cream. This recipe is called carrot banana oat bread. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 80 minutes!. It is composed of 5 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 16 ingredients which are: quick oats, flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ginger, egg, banana, carrot, butter, peanut butter, vanilla, lemon juice, nuts. Do the following: combine dry ingredients in a large bowl, mix together until smooth: beaten egg , banana , carrot , melted butter , peanut butter , vanilla , and lemon juice, add this to the dry ingredients and stir just until moistened, pour into a greased 8x8-inch square pan, bake at 375f for 45 minutes to 1 hour or until done

after baking ham, i always have leftovers so when i found this recipe i was excited.  hope you like it too. This course is called ham stroganoff. and it takes 35. The number of actions are 7 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: cooked ham, onion, butter, mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, flour, medium egg noodles. You have to: saute onion butter and ham until onions are clear, add mushrooms and flour, add mushroom soup and sour cream, hheat thru but do not boil, cook noodles as directed drain but do not rinse, add to sauce, let set for about 10 minutes with cover on before serving

i use the slicing blade on my cuisinart to make the slicing job fast and easy. i have monkeyed around with this recipe since the early 1980s, and about 10 years ago i settled on this combination of ingredients. i don't process them (i did once and i found the texture of the pickles suffered) but you certainly can if you wish. you can also store them in the fridge (if you have room) if you have safety concerns about not processing them; they'll be eaten pretty fast so won't be taking up a lot of room for long! This dish is called bread and butter pickles my way. and it won´t take more than 325 minutes. The are 10 actions so it has many steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: pickling cucumbers, onions, pickling salt, ice cube, white sugar, white vinegar, mustard seeds, celery seeds, turmeric. Do the following: i recommend using a cuisinart fitted with a slicing blade to make the preparation of the vegetables less tedious, in a very large container , combine sliced cucumbers and onions , and salt, cover with a generous amount of ice cubes, cover and let sit for approximately four hours, drain well and remove any ice, lightly rinse with cold water and drain well again, in a large preserving kettle , combine sugar , vinegar and spices and bring to a boil, add drained vegetables and bring back to a boil, fill hot sterilized canning jars with mixture and seal, please

a easy salmon dip everyone love, and i can never seem to make enough of it. This plat du jur is named salmon dip. and it takes 15. The are 5 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 5 which are: salmon, diced onion, philadelphia cream cheese, salt and pepper, lemon juice. You have to: remove the philly cheese from the fridge and let it get to room temperature, remove the salmon from the tin and remove the bones as many as possible and place into a bowl, add the onion and the philly cheese and mix until a semi smooth texture, add salt , pepper and lemon juice to taste and place into the fridge for an hour before serving, serve with bread or your favourite crackers

i got this recipe a long time ago and can't remember the source. it is in my recipe diary and i make it for a small gathering only. or for a special meal. chicken, mutton or beef can be used in this recipe. I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as meatballs in garlic  tomato and mint sauce. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 60 minutes!. The number of actions are 5 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 14 which are: mincemeat, onion, garlic, parsley, mint, salt, pepper, mustard powder, egg yolks, oil, onions, celery, tomato puree, tomato ketchup. Follow this steps: mix the mince with all other ingredients for the meat balls, divide into small sized balls fry well in moderately hot oil, set aside, for the sauce heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan, add the chopped onion and the celery , tomato puree and tomato ketchup mix well to form a smooth sauce add the fried meat balls and toss in the sauce

i havent made this as my dh wont eat chopped tomatoes, but i think it would be really tasty, and simple to make too. This wonderful male is baptized as pasta with creamy red pepper sauce. and it takes 30. It is composed of 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 12 which are: olive oil, onion, pasta, roasted red peppers, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, vegetable stock, sugar, salt, pepper, creme fraiche. You have to: heat the oil in a small saucepan , add the onion and fry for 5 minutes , stirring occasionally until pale golden, meanwhile , cook pasta according to package instructions, add the peppers , sun-dried tomatoes , and garlic to onion, fry for 2 more minutes , then add canned tomatoes , stock , sugar , and salt and pepper, cook gently for 10 minutes , stirring occassionally, drain the pasta , then stir in the tomato sauce and creme fraiche, toss together , and top with parmesan cheese to serve

this is a typical german dessert that i ate very often as a child. it is made from semolina and quite similar to pudding, only grainier. it is often eaten plain or with some cinnamon-sugar sprinkled on top. another popular way of eating it is topped with berry compote.
i hope youll enjoy this as much as we do! :) This recipe is named griebrei  german semolina pudding. and it takes 12. The number of actions are 7 so it has quite few steps. Is made of 4 ingredients which are: milk, vanilla extract, sugar, semolina. You have to: in a saucepan mix milk , sugar and vanilla, bring milk to a boil being careful not to burn it, reduce heat to medium, using a wire whisk stir in semolina and simmer for 5 minutes until semolina has thickened lightly, remove from heat , fill into serving bowls and allow to chill until completely set, you can also eat this lukewarm , when it is still creamy, serve with compote of your choice , cream or cinnamon-sugar

i love greek gyros sandwiches, but i don't like to eat lamb and it's not the healthiest food in the world.  this recipe satisfies my craving.  you can eat these on pita bread, but it's just as good on any other bread in place of deli meat.  serve it with tzatziki sauce, greek yogurt, or sour cream. This platte is named guilt free ground turkey gyros. and it takes 40. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 12 which are: lean ground turkey, oatmeal, egg, paprika, black pepper, salt, dried parsley, dried oregano, garlic powder, onion powder, cumin, allspice. You have to: preheat the oven to 350f, put all of the ingredients in a bowl , and spend a few minutes kneading the resulting mixture with your hands so everything is combined well, pour the mixture onto a lightly oiled 9x13 pan, smash it down with your hands a bit until it looks like a very large hamburger patty, bake it for 35 minutes, remove , then cut the meat into thin slices and serve, if you want a crispier , more authentic gyros texture , lay the sliced meat down on the pan and place in the broiler for 5 more minutes

in a hurry? in just 20 minutes, you can serve a hearty chicken chili with three different varieties of beans. This plat du jur is called chili con pollo. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 20 minutes!. The are 4 actions so it has few steps. You will need 7 ingredients which are: cooked chicken, red kidney beans, chickpeas, chili beans, mexican-style tomatoes, sour cream, green chili salsa. Follow this steps: in large saucepan , combine all ingredients except sour cream and salsa, cook over medium heat about 10 minutes , stirring occasionally , until hot, ladle chili into individual bowls, top each serving with sour cream and salsa

this recipe is from taste of home's light & tasty and is delicious.  my husband loves green beans and mushrooms not to mention garlic.  this recipe combines them all and is very easy to make.  you can adjust the spices to meet your family's tastes. This plat du jur is called garlicky green beans with mushrooms. and it won´t take more than 40 minutes. The are 9 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 7 which are: fresh green beans, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, butter, salt, onion powder, pepper. Do the following: place beans in a large saucepan and cover with water, bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until crisp-tender, meanwhile , in a large nonstick skillet , saute mushrooms and garlic in butter until tender, drain beans, add to skillet, stir in salt , onion powder and pepper, heat through

grilled herbed salmon (whole) over spaghetti aglio olio. salmon is good for you, and so is chilli (some say!). combine the 2, with your favourite pasta, and you get salmon aglio olio ... This wonderful male is baptized as salmon aglio olio pasta. and it won´t take more than 20 minutes. It is composed of 11 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 10 ingredients which are: salmon fillets, angel hair pasta, mixed herbs, salt, lemon, red chili pepper flakes, chili peppers, garlic cloves, olive oil, butter. Do the following: marinade the salmon fillet for about 10 minutes with mixed herbs and a few drops of lemon juice, mince garlic, glaze salmon with 1 tbsp olive oil and grill in oven for about 8 minutes or until salmon is no longer "translucent", cook angel hair pasta in a pot of boiling water for about 2 minutes, while pasta is cooking , heat the rest of the olive oil over a medium flame and add garlic and chilli flakes, when garlic becomes fragrant , turn off the fire, drain pasta and mix it into the olive oil mixture, sprinkle salt and mix, pour pasta onto plates and top with grilled salmon, smear butter on top of salmon and let it melt, garnish with whole chillis and serve

another recipe from denmark; very easy for a quick treat. should be kept refrigerated - if you can save any :) This wonderful male is named chocolate crisps   candy. and it won´t take more than 15 minutes. The number of actions are 8 so it has quite few steps. You will need 4 ingredients which are: butter, dark chocolate, rice krispies, raisins. Follow this steps: melt the butter in a saucepan, break the chocolate into smaller pieces and melt with the butter, stir, add rice crispies and raisins, pour the mixture into a 9 x 13 inch pan or cookie sheet with raised edges, should be lined with parchment paper, let the mix cool and cut / break into smaller pieces, keep refrigerated

these are delightful, easy appetizers.  adapted from a recipe i found on www.wholefoodsmarket.com.  as the recipe states, these are the perfect party starter served up with a glass of sparkling wine.  these are also on the menu at a st. louis tapas restaurant as a desert. . .interesting thought!  these are very rich, so plan on 2 per person.  one more note, these can be made without bacon if need be for a special diet. I will tell you this nice dish - is called manchego stuffed dates wrapped in bacon  tapas. and it shouldn't take more than 13 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 3 which are: pitted dates, manchego cheese, bacon. You have to: preheat broiler, cut your cheese into small rectangles just large enough to fill the cavity of your pitted date, stuff 1 piece of cheese into each date, wrap each date with a piece of bacon, place on baking sheet , seam side down , and broil for 4 minutes, turn dates over and broil another 4 minutes, serve hot

i don't usually care for hummus, but when i tried this at my friend's i couldn't stop eating it. it's important to use fresh lemons, extra virgin olive oil, and high quality garbanzo beans--you don't want ones that start out crunchy. i served this with lavosh bread that was brushed with olive oil, sprinkled with salt and pepper and baked at 350f for 8-10 minutes. This dish is named hummus with a twist. and it shouldn't take more than 10 minutes. The are 3 actions so it has few steps. The ingredients you will need are 9 which are: garbanzo beans, tahini, warm water, olive oil, lemons, juice of, garlic cloves, salt, cumin, pepper. You have to: blend first four ingredients with juice from 2 lemons in food processor until smooth and creamy , about 5 minutes, add blend in remaining ingredients starting with 4 cloves of garlic, taste and adjust seasoning as needed

i have not tried this recipe. i got this recipe from obesity help. it was posted by thekingskid. This wonderful male is baptized as pumpkin protein muffin pies. and it shouldn't take more than 65 minutes. The number of actions are 8 so it has quite few steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: pumpkin puree, vanilla protein powder, evaporated skim milk, eggs, brown sugar substitute, cinnamon, ginger, ground cloves, nutmeg. You have to: directions: preheat oven to 400, mix sugar and spices in a small bowl , set aside, lightly whip 6 eggs in a large bowl , add in pumpkin and mix thoroughly before sprinkling in sugar mix, blend protein powder and milk in a separate bowl with a hand mixer , then add to the pumpkin bowl mixing well before filling 18 lightly greased muffin tins, bake at 350 for 10 minutes , reduce heat to 300 and cook for 40 - 50 minutes, pies are cooked when a knife is inserted into the middle and comes out clean, once cool , top with light whipping cream if you wish or a mixture of fat free cream cheese , splenda and vanilla or maple extract to taste to make a frosting, store muffins in refrigerator , do no freeze

this popular potato dish from delhi, is eaten at school lunches, picnics and simple home meals is generally served with bread, such as deep fried pooris, and a selection of pickles. you can also serve it with pitta bread, yoghurt, a green vegetable and a chicken or meat dish. those who are cooking western meals will find that these potatoes taste quite wonderful with simple roast lamb. This dish is named indian potatoes cooked with ginger  labdharay aloo. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 75 minutes!. The are 22 actions so it has many steps. You will need 13 ingredients which are: potatoes, fresh ginger, water, tomatoes, vegetable oil, whole cumin seed, nigella seeds, fenugreek seeds, ground turmeric, ground cumin, ground coriander, red chili powder, salt. You have to: boil the potatoes in their skins, drain them and let them cool, peel them and cut them into 1-inch dice, peel the ginger and chop it coarsely, place it with 4 tbs, of water into the container of a food processor or blender, blend, chop the tomatoes into very small pieces, heat the oil in a large frying pan , saut pan or wide-based pan over a medium-high flame, when hot , put in the whole cumin seeds , nigella seeds , and fenugreek seeds, stir once and put in the ginger paste from the food processor or blender as well as the turmeric, stir for 1 minutes, add the tomatoes, continue to stir and cook until the tomatoes have turned paste-like, add the ground cumin , ground coriander and chilli powder, stir once or twice, now put in the potatoes , 1 cups of water and the salt, mix well and bring to a boil, turn heat to low , cover , and simmer gently for 15 minutes, serves 6, madhur jaffrey, a taste of india

use this to accompany roasted beets, or fried salt cod, or any of the greek fritter recipes. it is a condiment and is used like a mayonnaise and/or dip. This wonderful male is named skordalia  a garlic sauce condiment. and it takes 20. The number of actions are 5 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 6 which are: sourdough bread, garlic, olive oil, red wine vinegar, pine nuts, salt. Do the following: soak bread in water, squeeze dry between hands, put in food processor along with garlic , pine nuts or walnuts, process for 20 seconds, slowly drop in olive oil and vinegar , alternately , until mixture binds into a thick mayonnaise-like sauce

this dish is so versatile--you can serve with potatoes & veggies, alfredo, or on buns for lunch.  add a little lemon to make it springy! This plat du jur is called chicken oregano. and it won´t take more than 60 minutes. The number of actions are 8 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 9 which are: chicken breast halves, olive oil, butter, all-purpose flour, egg, salt, pepper, dried oregano, provolone cheese. You have to: heat oil and butter in a large skillet, dredge chicken in flour and shake of excess, dip in egg , allowing excess to drip off, saut in skillet a few pieces at a time , turn once , browning on both sides, arrange chicken in a buttered , shallow baking dish, sprinkle with salt , pepper , oregano and cheese, cover with foil , bake 15 minutes, remove foil , baking until browned , about 15-20 minutes

you gotta love how the taste of cinnamon and ginger complements this stew. This plat du jur is baptized as moroccan chicken stew with sweet potatoes. and it won´t take more than 45 minutes. It is composed of 17 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 13 which are: all-purpose flour, boneless skinless chicken thighs, salt and pepper, olive oil, onion, fresh ginger, cinnamon stick, reduced-sodium chicken broth, sweet potatoes, saffron, fresh lemon juice, couscous, fresh cilantro stem. You have to: place flour in a wide , shallow bowl, season chicken with salt and pepper, dredge in flour , shaking off excess, in a 5-quart dutch oven or heavy pot , heat oil over medium-high, add chicken , and cook until browned , 4 to 6 minutes per side, transfer to a plate, add onion , ginger , and cinnamon to pot, cook , stirring occasionally , until onion starts to soften , 2 to 3 minutes, return chicken to pot, add broth , sweet potatoes , and , if using , saffron, bring to a boil, reduce heat , and simmer until chicken is cooked through and sweet potatoes are tender , 10 to 15 minutes, discard ginger and cinnamon, stir in lemon juice , and season stew with salt and pepper, while stew is simmering prepare couscous according to package directions, serve chicken stew with couscous, garnished with cilantro , if desired

this soup is both satisfying and wholesome.  thanks to wanda veazey for this recipe! This wonderful male is called easy lentil soup. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 85 minutes!. The number of actions are 4 so it has few steps. The ingredients are 10 which are: whole tomatoes, garbanzo beans, potatoes, dry lentils, carrot, onion, green bell pepper, chili powder, garlic salt, water. You have to: in 4 quart saucepan or dutch oven , combine all ingredients, mix well, bring to a boil, reduce heat , cover , and simmer 45 to 55 minutes or until vegetables and lentils are tender

sauerkraut simmered with vegetables, apple, and juniper berries is a perfect match for bacon and chicken thighs. the robust combination of flavors makes this a great hearty winter dish. created by the staff of food & wine. for a white wine that will contrast nicely with the sauerkraut, look for a soft, full-flavored, and unoaked white. gewürztraminer or pinot gris from alsace in france are ideal choices. I will tell you this nice dish - is named braised chicken thighs with sauerkraut. and it takes 40. The are 14 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 12 which are: bacon, chicken thighs, salt, fresh ground black pepper, onion, carrot, tart apple, sauerkraut, low sodium chicken broth, dijon mustard, juniper berries, bay leaf. Do the following: in a large deep frying pan , cook the bacon over moderate heat until crisp, remove with a slotted spoon and reserve, season the chicken thighs with 1 / 2 teaspoon of the salt and the pepper and add to the pan in batches if necessary, cook , turning , until browned , about 8 minutes, remove from the pan, pour off all but 1 tablespoon of the fat, add the onion , carrot , and apple to the pan, cook over moderate heat , covered , for 5 minutes, stir in the sauerkraut , bacon , broth , the remaining 1 / 4 teaspoon salt , the mustard , juniper berries , and bay leaf, arrange the chicken in an even layer on top, bring to a simmer , reduce the heat , and cook , covered , until the chicken is just done , about 25 minutes, remove the chicken from the pan and discard the bay leaf, if too much liquid remains in the pan , raise the heat to moderately high and cook until slightly thickened, serve the sauerkraut topped with the chicken

this fruity cake is terrific at christmas, but it goes well with a cup of tea any time of the year. This course is baptized as fruity pineapple cake. and it won´t take more than 135 minutes. The number of actions are 9 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 13 which are: brown sugar, butter, currants, raisins, crushed pineapple, maraschino cherry, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, mace. You have to: preheat oven to 300f, line an 8-inch square cake pan with foil and set aside, put sugar , butter and fruits in a saucepan over medium to medium-low heat, beat eggs with a whisk until frothy in a small bowl, slowly whisk eggs into fruit mixture, combine all dry ingredients together then add all at once to wet mixture, stir well, pour into prepared pan and bake for 1-1 / 2- 2 hours , or until a wooden toothpick inserted in centre comes out clean, when cool enough to handle , remove from pan and store in an airtight container

this is my version of texas sheet cake.  i love maple anything and this is wonderful!  it tastes like a maple bar! This plat du jur is called maple texas sheet cake. and it takes 37. The number of actions are 14 so it has many steps. The ingredients are 12 which are: butter, water, sugar, eggs, sour cream, salt, baking soda, all-purpose flour, maple flavoring, milk, powdered sugar, walnuts. Follow this steps: boil butter and water in small saucepan, cream eggs , sugar , and sour cream in mixer or large mixing bowl, in separate bowl combine dry ingredients, start alternating the butter / water mixture and dry mixture into the egg / sugar mixture, add maple flavoring and mix well, pour into greased 15x10 pan, bake at 350f for 22 minutes or until tested done in center, while cake is baking , start on icing, boil butter and milk in small saucepan, remove from heat and add sugar and maple flavoring, mix until smooth, fold in walnuts, pour onto cake about 5 minutes after coming out of the oven, enjoy warm or cold !

from my collection of handwritten recipes. This dish is named sesame fried chicken  baked. and it shouldn't take more than 70 minutes. The number of actions are 10 so it has many steps. Is made of 10 ingredients which are: fryer chickens, flour, sesame seeds, paprika, salt, poultry seasoning, black pepper, egg, milk, shortening. Follow this steps: mix flour , sesame seeds , paprika , salt , poultry seasoning and pepper in a paper bag, shake the chicken in the bag, beat the egg slightly and add to the milk, dip the chicken pieces in this and then shake again in the bag, heat oil in a heavy skillet to measure 1 / 2 inch, cook the chicken until golden brown, transfer to shallow baking pan, cover and bake in a moderate oven for 20 minutes, uncover and cook 10 minutes longer to crisp, make sure chicken is done before serving

I will tell you this nice dish - is named rapini with garlic   chili flakes. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 15 minutes!. The are 9 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 5 which are: rapini, olive oil, garlic, chili flakes, salt & freshly ground black pepper. You have to: chop off bottom inch of stalks, bring a large pot of salted water to boil, add rapini, return to boil and boil about two to three minutes or until crisp-tender, drain, heat olive oil in a skillet on medium high heat, add garlic , pepper flakes and rapini, toss together for a minute or two , reduce heat , cover pan and cook three minutes, remove cover , season and serve

the original of this recipe was found online but has been slightly tweaked before being posted here for the zaar world tour 5. This dish is called crumbed lamb cutlets  australia. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 45 minutes!. It is composed of 7 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 6 ingredients which are: lamb cutlets, breadcrumbs, all-purpose flour, egg, sea salt, olive oil. Do the following: preheat oven to 350 degrees f, beat the egg in a bowl shallow enough to hold a whole cutlet, put bread crumbs in a similar bowl beside the whipped egg & then do the same with the flour in a 3rd bowl, roll cutlets in the flour , one at a time , then dip them in the egg before coating them with bread crumbs, heat oil in a large skillet over low heat , then fry cutlets for 6 minutes , 3 minutes on each side, on a baking tray , place fried cutlets on their edge so they form a rack & then cover them with aluminum foil, bake 20 minutes for medium or 25 minutes for well-done lamb

this is a recipe that my mother used to make for us when we were small. i don't recall where she got the recipe from, but it is very yummy! hope you enjoy! i don't know if 24 ounces of oreo's is the correct size, but i do know that it is the largest pack of the oreo cookies. This wonderful male is baptized as oreo dump. and it shouldn't take more than 30 minutes. It is composed of 6 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 4 ingredients which are: oreo cookies, cool whip, cream cheese, instant vanilla pudding. You have to: mix pudding as directed on box and add cream cheese, let sit 10-15 minutes then stir in cool whip, crumble 1 / 2 pkg of oreo cookies and put into bottom of 8x13 pan, spread all of the pudding mixture on cookies in pan, then put remaining crumbled oreo cookies on top and keep cool till ready to serve, enjoy !

my family loves meatloaf, this one in particular! This dish is called bacon topped meatloaf. and it shouldn't take more than 85 minutes. The number of actions are 6 so it has quite few steps. You will need 10 ingredients which are: chili sauce, eggs, worcestershire sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, lean ground beef, bacon. You have to: in a bowl , combine the first eight ingredients, crumble beef over mixture and mix well, shape into a loaf in an ungreased 13 inch by 9 inch by 2 inch baking dish, top with bacon, bake uncovered at 350 for 70-80 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and a meat thermometer reads 160 degrees, drain , let stand for 10 minutes before cutting

low sugar, low fat, quick, easy and everybody in my house loved it. that makes it a winner in my book! This course is called strawberry cream pie. and it takes 21. The number of actions are 7 so it has quite few steps. Is made of 8 ingredients which are: fat free cream cheese, vanilla, equal sugar substitute, graham cracker crust, fresh strawberries, wild strawberry sugar-free gelatin, water, cornstarch. You have to: beat cream cheese , vanilla and sweetener till fluffy and smooth, spread this in the pie crust, bring the water and cornstarch to boil till thick, add the gelatin and stir till dissolved, let it cool a few minutes while you slice a layer of strawberries over the cream cheese mixture , pour the gelatin mixture over the berries and then garnish with more strawberries, let cool in fridge and serve with whipped cream, this is a recipe that the dieters as well as non-dieters in our house really enjoyed !

wonderful for a weekend brunch. my whole family absolutely loves it. lots of flavor from the onions, chives, and bell pepper. there are lots of variations of this recipe but i like that this one uses milk instead of sour cream or cream cheese which are high in fat and this one still has just as much flavor. it came from debbie macomber's cedar cove cookbook that a friend got me for christmas. i only switch the whole milk to 1 % and keep the skillet at medium-low instead of low when making the sauce. can easily be doubled to serve more people. when i do, i use a 12 oz package of bacon and a 1 lb 14 oz bag of hash browns since that's what they usually come in anyways. also, the easiest way to snip the chives is with kitchen scissors. so much faster than with a knife! enjoy! This course is called hash brown casserole with bacon and cheddar. and it shouldn't take more than 80 minutes. The are 19 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 8 ingredients which are: bacon, onion, red bell pepper, all-purpose flour, milk, frozen hash brown potatoes, fresh chives, sharp cheddar cheese. Do the following: 1, preheat oven to 350 f, butter an 8-inch-square glass baking dish, 2, cook bacon in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat until crisp, remove slices, drain on a paper-towel-lined plate in same skillet over medium-low heat , cook onion and pepper in bacon dripping 8 minutes , until softened , stirring often, 3, keep skillet at medium-low, stir in flour, slowly pour in milk , cup at a time , stirring to incorporate smoothly with the flour, cook until mixture thickens and comes to a simmer , about 5 minutes , stirring often, crumble bacon into mixture, 4, evenly spread potatoes in prepared dish, top with half of the chives , 1 cup of the cheese , and the vegetable-bacon mixture, sprinkle with the remaining cup of cheese, bake 40-50 minutes , until potatoes are tender, sprinkle with remaining chives before cutting into squares

here's a recipe for some nice winter holiday biscuits (or for any time of year, actually) -- it comes from the 2004 cookbook, the joy of cranberries: the tangy red treat, that i received from a special partner in my 1st cookbook swap here on zaar! This wonderful male is baptized as dried cranberry biscuits. and it won´t take more than 25 minutes. The are 8 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 7 ingredients which are: all-purpose flour, baking powder, corn oil, milk, dried sweetened cranberries, granulated sugar, ground cinnamon. Do the following: preheat oven to 400 degrees f , & coat a baking sheet with cooking spray, mix flour & baking powder , then stir in corn oil , mixing until coarse crumbs form, stir in milk to form a soft dough , then stir in cranberries, with floured hands , form dough into a ball , then press dough onto prepared baking sheet before evenly pressing it into a 6"x6" square, cut dough into 12 biscuits , but do not separate them, mix sugar with cinnamon & sprinkle over the cut dough, bake 15-20 minutes or until lightly browned, great served with a flavored butter

this recipe is close to my favorite appetizer from my favorite restaurant in anchorage, alaska. it's creamy and delicious served with thinly sliced crusty bread.this is different from most crab dips posted here because it doesn't call for cream cheese. This course is called baked crab dip  like simon and seafort s restaurant. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 20 minutes!. The number of actions are 3 so it has few steps. The ingredients are 6 which are: mayonnaise, canned artichoke heart, lump crabmeat, fresh parmesan cheese, green onion, fresh parsley. You have to: mix all ingredients well, bake in a 1 quart dish at 350 for 8-10 minutes, serve hot

posting this recipe for world tour 2006.
in english this is honey roasted almonds.
recipe taken from internet site recipesbycindy This dish is named honig brat mandeln  honey roasted almonds. and it takes 50. The number of actions are 11 so it has many steps. The ingredients are 6 which are: almonds, sugar, salt, honey, water, almond oil. You have to: spread the almonds in a single layer in a shallow ungreased baking pan and place in cold oven, bake at 350f , stirring occasionally , until the internal color of the nut is tan to light brown , 12 to 15 minutes, set the roasted almonds aside, thoroughly mix the sugar and salt , and set aside, stir together the honey , water , and oil in a medium-size saucepan and bring to a boil over medium heat, stir in the roasted almonds and continue to cook and stir until all of the liquid has been absorbed by the nuts , about 5 minutes, immediately transfer the almonds to a medium-sized bowl into which some sugar mixture has been sprinkled, sprinkle the remaining sugar mixture over the almonds and toss until they are evenly coated, spread the almonds out onto a silicon pad or parchment paper, when cool , store at room temperature in a tightly covered container or plastic bag, will keep up to 2 weeks

a light and tasty treat from cooking light.   the cooking light recipe said that this makes 24 bars.  i disagree, i cut my bars big enough for 12.  not as light, but more than a bite. This dish is called brown sugar shortbread bars. and it shouldn't take more than 65 minutes. It is composed of 22 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 7 ingredients which are: all-purpose flour, cornstarch, salt, light brown sugar, butter, ice water, cooking spray. Do the following: 1, weigh or lightly spoon flour into a dry measuring cup, level with a knife, combine flour , cornstarch , and salt in a small bowl, stir with a whisk, 2, place brown sugar and butter in a medium bowl, mix with hands until combined, add flour mixture , and mix with hands until combined, sprinkle dough with 1 1 / 2 teaspoons ice water, knead dough lightly 4 times or just until smooth, wrap in plastic wrap, refrigerate 30 minutes, 3, preheat oven to 325, 4, place dough on a baking sheet coated with cooking spray, press dough into an 8 x 5inch rectangle about 3 / 8-inch thick, pierce entire surface liberally with a fork, bake at 325 for 25 minutes or just until set and edges are golden, cut shortbread into 24 pieces, cool completely

salmon is such a tasty and healthy fish as it is packed with omega 3.  here is a healthy and different way of preparing salmon that i found on the bbc good food magazine website. This wonderful male is named horseradish baked salmon. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 17 minutes!. The number of actions are 6 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 4 which are: bread, horseradish sauce, dried thyme, boneless skinless salmon fillets. Follow this steps: heat oven to 400 degrees, whiz the bread into crumbs in a food processor, add the horseradish and thyme , then season and mix well, put the salmon in one layer in a lightly oiled baking dish, press the crumbs on to the flesh, bake for 10-12 minutes

an authentic mexican stew. very tasty. I will tell you this nice dish - is called mexican chicken stew. and it takes 90. The are 15 actions so it has many steps. You will need 12 ingredients which are: chicken stock, boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, onions, garlic cloves, tomatoes, salsa, corn chips, cilantro leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, monterey jack cheese, sour cream. Follow this steps: bring the chicken stock to a boil in a deep skillet, sprinkle the chicken breasts with salt and pepper and add to the broth, cover and cook 8 to 10 minutes , or until cooked through, then lift out the chicken , reserving the stock , wrap in a damp towel and set aside to cool, heat 2 tablespoons oil in a stockpot over medium heat, saute the half of the onions with 1 teaspoon salt and 1 / 2 teaspoon pepper until soft, add the garlic and cook 2 or 3 minutes , until the aroma is released, add the tomatoes and salsa and bring to a boil, add the reserved chicken stock and simmer 10 minutes, when the chicken is cool enough to handle , shred it into long strips, to finish , add the shredded chicken to the salsa pot and bring to a boil, taste for salt and pepper and stir in the cilantro and tortilla strips or chips, 6-7 per bowl, ladle into 4 bowls , sprinkle with the grated cheese and the remaining onion and top with a dollop of sour cream, serve hot

with an ex b/f from washington state who grew up eating lots of apples grown there, i have was at one point collecting more apple recipes and this is one of the tastier ways to get in a serving of fruit, albeit certainly not low fat hehehe.this is a great family dessert. creamy yet not too heavy and you can pretend it's good for you because of the apple pie filling. This platte is named washington state caramel apple cheesecake pie. and it takes 220. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 9 which are: graham cracker pie crusts, apple pie filling, cream cheese, sugar, lemon juice, vanilla, eggs, caramel ice cream topping, pecans. Follow this steps: place crust on baking sheet & spread half of the apple filling in crust, set aside, in large mixing bowl beat cream cheese , sugar , lemon juice and vanilla on medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy, add eggs , one at a time , mixing until just combined after each addition then gently spread over filling in crust, bake on baking sheet at 350f for 30 to 35 minutes or until center is almost set, cool for 1 hour, refrigerate at least 3 hours, spread with remaining pie filling, drizzle with ice cream topping & garnish with pecans, store in refrigerator

i'm going to praise myself for a minute here and say this really is the best tasting roast ever. and i challenge everyone to check it out. the flavor is amazing, the left overs, especially the potatoes, were awesome the next day!!!!!! please note** regarding the review received--i tried making it with a packet of dry italian seasoning mix and it was just as good! I will tell you this nice dish - is called jen s best ever crock pot roast. and it takes 310. The number of actions are 8 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: beef roast, "campbells french onion soup", italian salad dressing, baking potatoes, ground red pepper, black pepper, seasoning salt, garlic salt. Follow this steps: peel and chop potatoes , place in bottom of pot, rinse meat with water , pat dry, meat lays on top of potatoes, season meat to taste, pour can of soup over roast, add salad dressing over roast also, cook on low 8-9 hours or on high a little over 5 hours, enjoy !

this is quick, easy and good. from the mccormick website. This recipe is named jammin  jerk chicken. and it takes 20. It is composed of 3 actions so it has few steps. Is made of 6 ingredients which are: caribbean jerk seasoning, thyme, onion powder, ground allspice, orange juice, boneless skinless chicken breasts. You have to: combine all seasonings with orange juice to make a spice paste, rub paste over both sides of the chicken, grill or broil chicken 5-7 minutes per side or until juices run clear

a traditional prepared risotto with orzo. comes out very flavorful and creamy.
great side dish. This recipe is called orzo and mushroom risotto. and it shouldn't take more than 45 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 10 which are: olive oil, butter, orzo pasta, onion, garlic, dry white wine, chicken stock, salt, white pepper, sliced mushrooms. Follow this steps: in a 12 inch non-stick skillet over medium heat melt butter with oil and saut mushrooms and onions until tender , remove from heat, in a 2-quart saucepan over medium high heat , add the olive oil and butter, once the oil is hot and the butter is melted , add the orzo and stir until lightly toasted , about 3 minutes, add the garlic and cook for 30 seconds , stirring, add the wine , stir , and cook to deglaze the pan, once the wine has nearly evaporated , add the mushrooms , onions and 1 cup of the stock , stirring constantly until the stock is absorbed by the orzo , about 10 minutes , repeat 1 cup of stock at a time stirring constantly and add the salt , and white pepper with last cup, when the last cup of stock is absorbed stir in the butter and adjust the seasoning , to taste

a cool, light, delicious, somewhat spicy dip to be served with pita chips or nacho chips.  i found this recipe under a different name in a "company's coming" recipe book, but altered the ingredients slightly for my own taste. This course is called jalapeo dip. and it won´t take more than 375 minutes. The are 2 actions so it has few steps. Is made of 7 ingredients which are: light cream cheese, light sour cream, pickled jalapeno pepper, onion flakes, lemon juice, salt, dry mustard. Follow this steps: combine all ingredients and beat until smooth, it is recommended that this dip is chilled for at least 6 hours before serving to properly blend the flavors

i was inspired by another potato soup recipe that i recently made in a tag game i was participating in and that recipe became a huge favorite for me, so i decided i wanted to create a potato soup of my own.  i had various ingredients hanging out in the pantry and fridge that needed serious rescue from the trash, so i started inventing this soup and imho it turned out absolutely excellent; rich, creamy, flavorful, simple, and comforting.  the dairy-free part is due to my dietary needs.  i have ibs and dairy products are very unfriendly to my gi tract.  if you do substitute with the real mccoy on the non-dairy items, it may or may not affect the final product.  please add any additional seasonings you feel are necessary.  i am posting this recipe exactly as i created it with the precise ingredients i used and measurements, too.  i did have to approximate the serving size, because i ate this on its own and all by myself.  i'm very proud of my creation and would appreciate any feedback if you decide to try it, whether you make it as directed or with substitutions.  enjoy! :) This course is named sommer s loaded potato soup  dairy free. and it shouldn't take more than 45 minutes. The are 19 actions so it has many steps. You will need 11 ingredients which are: potatoes, water, white onion, bacon, yellow pepper, non-dairy cheddar cheese, potato water, almond breeze non-dairy beverage, green onions, tofutti sour cream, salt and pepper. You have to: regarding the cooking method of the white onions and yellow pepper, i purposely cooked them down , but if you would rather you can add the white onions and yellow pepper a bit later , but before the bacon is finished cooking, i wanted to infuse the flavors of the three in the skillet, in a skillet fry up the chopped bacon , adding in the chopped white onion and chopped yellow pepper at the same time, add the chopped and peeled potatoes to 2 cups of water and bring to a boil, cover and turn heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes, when bacon is crisp and onion and pepper are translucent , drain on paper towels, when potatoes are tender , add 4 slotted spoonfuls of potatoes into a blender, add 1 / 3 cup non-dairy milk and 1 / 3 cup of the potato water, blend potatoes and liquid until smooth, drain potatoes left in the pan , but reserve the potato water and set aside, add blended potatoes back into pan with remaining un-blended potatoes, add to the pan 1 / 3 cup non-dairy shredded cheddar cheese , 1 tbsp non-dairy sour cream , the drained bacon , onion and pepper mixture , and another 1 / 3 cup of the reserved potato water, stir to combine , heating on medium until cheese is melted, add 1 -2 tbsp of sliced green onion , and salt and pepper to taste, heat for an additional minute or less, this should create a fairly thick soup , but if you want it thinner , add in more of the leftover reserved potato water a little at a time until desired consistency is reached, serves approximately 3, enjoy !

i got this from recipe goldmine under valetines menu's. i haven't tried it yet but it looks easy and elegant! This dish is named champagne poached alaska salmon. and it won´t take more than 17 minutes. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: salmon steaks, champagne, fresh lemon juice, lemon zest, onion, capers, fresh tarragon, salt and pepper. Do the following: remove any skin or bones from salmon, season alaska salmon steaks / fillets lightly with salt and pepper, place in a pan just large enough to hold the salmon in 1 layer, add the champagne , lemon juice and just enough water to cover the fish, remove the fish and bring the liquid to a boil, return the salmon steaks / fillets to the pan, top each with an onion slice , capers , and tarragon sprig, reduce heat to a simmer , cover pan with foil and poach at no more than a simmer for 6 to 10 minutes, remove salmon steaks / fillets from the liquid and place on 4 warm serving plates, top each piece of fish with 1 ounce of the liquid top with olives , capers and onions

warning: only make these if you know other people will eat them.  otherwise, you will eat the whole batch. This course is baptized as chocolate chip cream cheese cupcakes. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 40 minutes!. The are 8 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 12 ingredients which are: cream cheese, sugar, salt, egg, vanilla, chocolate chips, flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, vegetable oil, water, white vinegar. You have to: preheat oven to 325 degrees, in a small bowl , combine cream cheese , 1 1 / 3 c sugar , 1 / 4 tsp salt , egg , 1 tsp vanilla and chocolate chips, set aside, combine the rest of the ingredients in a medium sized bowl and mix well, place paper cups into a dry cupcake pan, fill the cups 3 / 4 full , then spoon the cream cheese mixture in the center of each, bake for about 20 minutes , then check, after cooled , sprinkle with powdered sugar

by gladys wainwright but i am totally unsure who she is !! This platte is named jiffy date bars. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 35 minutes!. The number of actions are 5 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 6 which are: sugar, self raising flour, eggs, dates, walnuts, vanilla essence. Do the following: beat eggs and sugar together, stir in flour , walnuts , dates and vanilla, press into grease lamington tin, bake in a moderate oven - 180 c for 25 minutes, cut into bars while still hot then leave to cool

this recipe is from savvyvegetarian.com 
i modified the instructions to make it faster. This dish is baptized as easy tasty hearty lentil black bean stew. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 35 minutes!. The number of actions are 9 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 16 which are: dry lentils, canned black beans, minced garlic cloves, bay leaf, vegetable stock cube, water, olive oil, carrots, potatoes, celery ribs, green cabbage, leaf thyme, low sodium spaghetti sauce, fresh ground black pepper, parsley, salt. You have to: saute chopped veggies and garlic in the olive oil with a thyme leaf in a soup pot, add 4 cups of cold water , bay leaf , lentils , black beans and unsalted veggie cube to the pot, bring to a boil and cook for 25 minutes on medium / high, in a crockpot , cook 5 hours on low, add spaghetti sauce , salt and pepper to taste , and heat on medium for 5 more minutes, add minced parsley and serve, slow cooker or crockpot directions: throw everything in the crockpot , set the heat on low , cover and cook for 6 - 8 hours, add the spaghetti sauce , salt & pepper and parsley at the end, remove bay leaf before serving

i found in jewishfood-list.com and they are very tasty. i didn't make the frosting but the original recipe calls for it. This dish is named carrot drop cookies. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 45 minutes!. The are 11 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 13 ingredients which are: carrots, butter, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, pecans, powdered sugar, cream cheese. Do the following: heat oven to 350f, combine the butter and the two sugars in a large mixer bowl, beat until creamy, add eggs and vanilla, add flour , baking soda , salt and cinammon, stir in pecans and carrots, drop dough by tablespoonsfuls onto greased cookie sheets, bake for 12 to 15 minutes, let them cool completely, meanwhile beat the powdered sugar with the butter , cream sheese and vanilla until creamy, frost each cooled cookie with 2 teaspoonfuls frosting

ever come home from work and want the comforting taste of a good old-fashioned stew? you don't have to wait for the weekend. a good quality meat is important so the stew cooks quickly. of course, it's better when simmered for three hours but even one hour's cooking will produce a satisfying stew when prepared this way. This recipe is named one hour beef stew. and it takes 60. It is composed of 13 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 16 which are: garlic, onion, celery, olive oil, beef round steak, tomato paste, fresh thyme, bay leaf, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, beef stock, red wine, carrots, baby red potatoes, frozen peas, potato starch. Follow this steps: roughly chop garlic , onion and celery and then chop in a food processor, cut beef into small , 3 / 4 inch cubes or cut into strips , the size of index finger, heat oil in a dutch oven and saute beef until browned, add chopped vegetables from food processor , tomato paste , thyme , bay leaf , parsley , salt and pepper, stir well to mix, add stock and wine and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer , covered , for 45 minutes, while meat is simmering , boil carrots and potatoes until tender-crisp , 5-10 minutes, drain and add to stew, add peas, the entire cooking time for the stew is 45 minutes, if stew is too thin , dissolve starch in 1 t cold water and whisk into stew, simmer 2-3 minutes and serve

from 3 fat chicks on a diet
update-2-11-09: ok seriously!!!!! these are awesome!!! i added a little sliced olives to the veggie mix and used green peppers instead of red. after i brushed the egg white on i added a little grated parm. served with marinara sauce! hubby loved these also. he said "dont lose this recipe!" lol! these are soooo simple to make! I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as veggie calzones   5 ww points. and it won´t take more than 30 minutes. The are 12 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 9 ingredients which are: fresh mushrooms, zucchini, sweet red pepper, green onion, garlic salt, dried basil, prepared pizza crust, lowfat mozzarella cheese, egg white. You have to: heat oven to 425 degrees, spray cookie sheet with non-stick cooking spray, in bowl , combine mushrooms , zucchini , pepper and onions, sprinkle with garlic salt and basil and mix well, unroll dough and place on cookie sheet, roll into a 14 inch square and cut into 4 pieces, place 1 / 4 cup of cheese on each square and spread to within 1 / 2 inch of edge, top each with 1 / 4 of vegetable mixture, fold dough over in half and press edges with fork to seal, brush each pastry with egg white, cut 2 or 3 slits in top of each pastry to allow steam to escape, bake at 425 degrees for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown

This course is called leeks with tangy vinaigrette. and it shouldn't take more than 25 minutes. The number of actions are 5 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 10 which are: chicken stock, bay leaf, leek, yellow peppers, lemon, olive oil, dried tarragon, dried basil, garlic, fresh ground black pepper. Follow this steps: pour stock into a large skillet , add bay leaf , and bring to a simmer, add leeks , cover and simmer until tender , about 9 to 10 minutes, remove leeks from stock with a slotted spoon and arrange them on a serving platter , along with pepper strips, in a small bowl , combine lemon juice and pulp , oil , tarragon , basil , garlic , and black pepper and whisk until combined, sprinkle over leeks , then serve warm or chilled

there are many ways to make somali tea, this is one way to make it. you can experiment and try adding more/less ingredients until you find your favourite way. i adapted a recipe from a somali cooking website. you will need a small fine strainer. enjoy! This wonderful male is called shaah  somali tea. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 5 minutes!. The number of actions are 5 so it has quite few steps. You will need 6 ingredients which are: tea bag, cardamom seeds, clove, sugar, water, milk. Follow this steps: add tea bag , cardamom seeds , cloves and sugar to a large mug, add boiling water, "stir well , the tea bag may break open but thats ok because it will be strained", add the milk or nido to another mug then strain tea into that mug, stir and serve

this is a wonderfully simple and tasty recipe from the oct/nov 2004 issue of cooking pleasures magazine.  it's so good i don't bother making salmon any other way. This wonderful male is named apricot balsamic glazed salmon. and it takes 31. The number of actions are 10 so it has many steps. You will need 6 ingredients which are: apricot preserves, balsamic vinegar, gingerroot, garlic, salt, salmon fillets. Follow this steps: heat oven to 425 degrees f, line shallow baking pan with foil, spray with non-stick cooking spray, in small saucepan , add all ingredients except salmon, heat 3-4 min or until slightly thickened , stirring occasionally, remove from heat, cool slightly, place salmon on baking sheet, top with glaze, bake 10-12 min or until salmon begins to flake

the best and easiest blue cheese dressing out of all the restaurants i have worked! we make it with maytag blue cheese. the quality of the dressing is directly proportional to the flavor of the blue cheese. try sam's club for large amounts of blue cheese like maytag, at a good price for the home cook. This wonderful male is called restaurant  x  secret blue cheese dressing. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 10 minutes!. The are 6 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 8 which are: blue cheese, buttermilk, mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, pepper, garlic, butter. Follow this steps: on very low heat , cook garlic in butter , until soft and fragrant, add 1 / 2 of the blue cheese and melt, remove from heat and cool, combine with remaining ingredients , including the 2nd half of the blue cheese in a large bowl and whisk, chill and serve, magical !

my kids love chicken curry.  if it is "sport night" i can stop at the store and pick up a whole barbecued chicken and have this on the table in 20 minutes.  leftovers taste even better.  i serve it over rice. This wonderful male is baptized as easy chicken curry. and it takes 20. The number of actions are 10 so it has many steps. You will need 11 ingredients which are: butter, onion, green apple, garlic clove, cornstarch, curry powder, milk, chicken broth, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice, cooked chicken. Do the following: melt butter in large skillet over medium low heat, add the onion , apple and garlic and mix well, cook , covered over low heat until the onion is tender and translucent , about 12 minutes, add the curry powder to the onion mixture and mix well, dissolve cornstarch in the milk and add it to the mixture, add the chicken broth and mix well, reduce the heat to low and cook , stirring frequently , until slightly thickened, add the lemon zest and lemon juice and mix well, stir in the chicken and continue cooking until the chicken is heated through, optional: serve over rice with condiments such as chutney , raisins , diced bell peppers , cucumber , tomato , pineapple , papaya , mango , banana , kiwi , chopped scallions , hard-boiled eggs , peanuts or toasted almonds

a quick pork chop supper. serve with a salad and you have a easy meal. in the time the chops are simmering, you can whip up a fast dessert! This plat du jur is called pork chops with potato gravy. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 60 minutes!. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 7 which are: pork chops, flour, garlic salt, onion powder, pepper, margarine, cream of potato soup. Follow this steps: coat chops with flour and seasonings, brown in margarine on both sides in skillet, spoon soup over all, cover and cook on low until chops are tender , about 40 minutes, remove chops, cook and stir gravy , scraping down the pan until bubbly and thickened, serve over chops

found this in a rach magazine.  it isn't quite as greasy as other fritters.  also, you can start with leftover rice from a chinese restaurant if you don't want to make the rice. This recipe is baptized as easy cheesy bacon rice fritters. and it shouldn't take more than 50 minutes. The are 20 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 11 ingredients which are: arborio rice, bacon, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, egg, salt, pepper, seasoned bread crumbs, extra virgin olive oil, spinach, red pepper. Follow this steps: line a baking sheet with parchment paper, in a medium saucepan , bring the rice and 2 1 / 2 cups water to a boil, lower the heat and simmer until the rice is still firm , but cooked through and the water has evaporated , about 20 minutes, transfer to a large bowl and let cool slightly, this is about 3 cups cooked rice, in a large skillet , cook the bacon until crisp, using a slotted spoon , add the bacon to the rice , reserving the skillet with the bacon greast, stir the mozarella , parmesan , and egg into the rice mixture, season with salt and pepper, divide the rice mixture into 12 mounds on the prepared baking sheet, flatten into 3-inch patties, sprinkle on both sides with the breadcrumbs, panko crumbs work well here also, add the olive oil to the skillet and heat over medium-high heat, add the patties and cook , turning once , until crisp , about 5 minutes, drain on paper towels, optional, add the spinach to the skillet and cook over high heat , turning until wilted , about 2 minutes, season with the crushed red pepper, top with the fritters

this is my favorite banana bread recipe.  if you have more bananas, then the better.  i usually can only manage to save two for this quick bread.  it is very moist, but if you add more banana or another tablespoon of oil, you might make it even better. This plat du jur is called chocolate banana bread  low fat. and it won´t take more than 60 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 15 which are: whole wheat pastry flour, quick-cooking oats, toasted wheat germ, baking powder, baking soda, dry buttermilk, dark cocoa, brown sugar, applesauce, canola oil, eggs, bananas, hot water, walnuts, dark chocolate chips. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees, beat eggs , sugar , oil , applesauce , vanilla , and banana in a large bowl, in a separate bowl , mix dry ingredients and then add to the wet ingredients , being careful not to overmix, add the hot water and let sit for about 5-10 minutes, add walnuts and dark chocolate chips, i usuallly chop chocolate off of a bar , but chips work too, bake in a greased 8 1 / 2 by 4 1 / 2 loaf pan or 4 mini loaf pans for about 40 minutes

this is another pasta salad that my husband enjoys. sometimes i use frozen corn & add it to the pasta while boiling. This platte is baptized as moroccan pasta salad with tuna. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 7 minutes!. The are 4 actions so it has few steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: mayonnaise, olive oil, cumin, salt, onion powder, rotini pasta, tuna in olive oil, corn, black olives. Do the following: mix the olive oil , mayo , & spices together in a small bowl, mix the other ingredients together in a large bowl, then stir the mayo mixture in with the pasta, serve cold

this is another recipe that i fondly remember from the frances virginia tea room which was located on the third floor of the collier bldg in atlanta until 1962. This platte is called hot milk cake with lemon filling and boiled white frosting. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 75 minutes!. The are 32 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 15 ingredients which are: eggs, sugar, flour, milk, butter, baking powder, salt, pure vanilla extract, almond extract, egg yolks, water, lemon juice, lemon rind, egg whites, cream of tartar. Follow this steps: for the cake:, preheat oven to 350 degrees, beat eggs thoroughly with electric mixer, gradually ad sugar, beat until fluffy, sift flour 2 times, add , beating thoroughly, place milk and butter in small saucepan and let come to a boil, add immediately to flour mixture and beat until cool, batter will be quite thin, sift in remaining 1 tablespoon flour , baking powder and salt, add floverings, beat 1 minute more, pour into 3 well-greased and floured 9 inch cake pans, bake approximately 30 minutes or until tester comes out clean, "i get sneaky here cause i love kittencals pan release , #78579", for the filling:, mix dry ingredients, beat egg yolks with water and juice, add dry ingredients, blend well, cook in double boiler until clear, remove from heat, add rind and butter, spread on layers and stack, for frosting:, boil sugar and water until syrup forms thread about 3 inches long when dropped from a spoon , or cook until syrup has reached 238 degrees on candy thermometer, beat egg whites with salt until stiff, while very hot , pour syrup in fine stream over egg whites, beat until misture is creamy and reaches spreading consistency, add cream of tarter and vanilla, spread on sides and top of cake

a follow-up to recipe #349613, this recipe is healthier and has more fresh ingredients. you could realistically have this meal on the table in a half hour as you are doing a lot of the prep while waiting for the pasta. this counts as 7 ww points. enjoy! This dish is baptized as nif s 30 minute tuna casserole. and it won´t take more than 35 minutes. It is composed of 12 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 13 which are: rotini pasta, olive oil, mushrooms, onion, celery, garlic cloves, tuna, low-fat sour cream, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper, low-fat cheddar cheese, fresh breadcrumb. You have to: cook pasta as directed, preheat oven to 400f, while waiting for the water to boil , add mushrooms , onion , celery and garlic to a nonstick pan sprayed with olive oil, saute over medium heat until just tender, the moisture from the veggies will keep them from sticking, while cooking the pasta , stir tuna , sour cream , worcestershire sauce , salt and pepper into the pan, remove from heat and add cheddar cheese, when pasta is al dente , stir into pan, pour into a casserole dish sprayed with olive oil, cover with bread crumbs, cook for 15 minutes, the higher heat will ensure that you have some crunch to the bread crumbs

this recipe uses all natural healthy ingredients, should be good for any diet. our family loves these, we have tried them with strawberry and blueberry syrup so far. tips: make your own oat flour to save cost. pour quaker rolled oats into a blender and blend until all is a powder. buy whole wheat flour that has not been bleached. use only pure honey. use almond, rice or soy milk (try not to use cow milk) make your own lemon juice by squeezing a fresh room temperature lemon. extra virgin cold pressed olive oil has the best taste and has no extra junk in it. use real vanilla extract, imitation has too many chemicals and not as good a flavor. if you want to loose weight and feel better this is a very good breakfast, has plenty of fiber to help cleanse the colon which is always the best place to start cleaning for a successful diet and a healthy lifestyle. This wonderful male is baptized as whole wheat oat pancakes. and it won´t take more than 20 minutes. The number of actions are 10 so it has many steps. You will need 10 ingredients which are: oat flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, almond milk, honey, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, eggs, vanilla extract, strawberry. Follow this steps: pancakes:, combine oat flour , whole wheat flour and baking powder in large bowl , mix and set aside, in blender combine milk , honey , lemon juice , olive oil , egg and vanilla until completely blended pour into bowl containing the flour mixture and mix well, on heated griddle or pan , pour enough pancake mix to create your desired size of pancake, cook one first side 20 to 30 seconds then flip over and cook about 10 seconds longer , remove from pan and repeat until mix is used up, syrup:, combine berries in small sauce pan with honey and heat on medium heat until starting to bubble, pour into blender and blend until completely mixed, put pancakes on plate and serve with berry syrup, enjoy

from the cookbook "cooking up a storm: recipes lost and found" edited by judy walker This plat du jur is baptized as spicy sweet potato corn soup. and it shouldn't take more than 45 minutes. The are 8 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 12 ingredients which are: vegetable oil, onion, garlic, sweet potatoes, vegetable broth, jalapeno, corn kernel, molasses, salt, cayenne pepper, black pepper, ground cinnamon. You have to: in a large saucepan or soup pot , heat oil over medium heat, add onions and garlic and saute until just soft , about 3 minutes, add sweet potatoes and vegetable stock and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are soft , about 10 minutes, remove from heat, using an immersion blender or a food processor , puree contents of pot until smooth, reheat soup , stirring in jalepeno , corn , molasses , salt , cayenne , black pepper and cinnamon, adjust seasonings to taste

this is a recipe i got from a friend who replaced the beef with tofu for our friends who are vegetarian, and also those who are trying to vary their diets and not have so many meals with meat. This recipe is baptized as spicy tofu vegetarian chili. and it won´t take more than 60 minutes. The number of actions are 14 so it has many steps. The ingredients are 12 which are: pasta, onions, green pepper, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, garlic powder, dry crushed red pepper, crushed tomatoes in puree, firm tofu, kidney beans, reduced-fat cheddar cheese. You have to: cook pasta according to package directions , omitting salt and fat, drain and set aside, coat a dutch oven with cooking spray and place over medium heat, add onion and green pepper, saute until tender, add garlic and saute for one more minute, add chili powder , cumin , garlic powder and crushed red pepper, cook , stirring constantly , 1 minute, stir in tomatoes and tofu, bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat and simmer , uncovered , 15 minutes, add beans and cook 10 additional minutes or until bean mixture is thoroughly heated, to serve , place 1 / 2 cup pasta into each of 6 individual bowls , and spoon 1 cup chili over each serving, top servings evenly with cheese

This plat du jur is named chocolate rice krispies cake. and it shouldn't take more than 10 minutes. The number of actions are 4 so it has few steps. The ingredients you will need are 6 which are: honey, peanut butter, vanilla, rice krispies, chocolate chips, salted peanuts. Do the following: combine honey and peanut butter in saucepan and heat to boiling , stirring constantly, remove from heat and add vanilla, stir in rice krispies , chocolate chips and peanuts, press into a greased 9x12-inch pan

this is a good tex-mex side dish (or even a main dish) that isn't very spicy, but is very garlicky.  we had this with recipe #120056.  i didn't have quite enough of the fresh herbs so i mixed dried with fresh.  from fine cooking (april/may 2005) This platte is named mexican tomato rice and beans. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 55 minutes!. It is composed of 15 actions so it has many steps. You will need 13 ingredients which are: white rice, cold water, diced tomatoes, water, olive oil, garlic cloves, jalapeno, black beans, kosher salt, ground cumin, chili powder, fresh oregano, fresh cilantro. Do the following: in a one quart saucepan , combine rice with water, bring to a boil over medium-high heat , cover , reduce heat to low , and cook for 20 minutes, remove from heat and let the pan stand , covered , for 5 minutes, while the rice stands , drain the tomatoes , reserving the juice, add enough water to the juice to equal one cup of liquid, heat a 10-12 inch skillet over medium-high heat, add in oil , garlic , and jalapeno, cook until the garlic is browned and the jalapeno is fragrant, add the black beans , salt , cumin , and chili powder, stir gently a few times to cook the spices and get beans mixed into the rice, stir in the tomato juice mixture and bring to a boil, adjust the heat as necessary to maintain a gentle boil, cook and occasionally stir until the beans have absorbed much of the liquid, add the tomatoes , oregano , cilantro , and cooked rice, cook , stirring occasionally , until the rice is warmed

this simple recipe was found online at goneraw. I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as cranberry sauce  raw food. and it takes 5. It is composed of 2 actions so it has few steps. Is made of 4 ingredients which are: fresh cranberries, apple, orange, dates. Do the following: in a food processor , process cranberries , apple , orange , orange zest & dates only until blended , but chunky, chill , then serve

definately a two handed sandwich, blackened cajun grilled chicken with extras! from a friend of mine weighs 100 lbs and eats like a horse! This plat du jur is baptized as ultimate chicken sandwich. and it shouldn't take more than 20 minutes. It is composed of 17 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 11 which are: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cajun seasoning, bacon, swiss cheese, white button mushrooms, hoagie rolls, salad dressing, lettuce, tomatoes, onion, avocado. You have to: sprinkle chicken breasts with cajun seasoning , then spray lightly with "pam" or other cooking oil spray, grill over med to med low heat for 6-8 minutes or until done, while chicken is grilling saute mushrooms in sm amount of butter, "if you havent precooked the bacon , you can do it now", heat sub rolls in oven until hot, when chicken is done assemble as follows per sandwich --, spread sweet vadalia dressing or honey mustard on each half of roll generously, place one slice of swiss cheese, place 2 slices of cooked bacon, spread cooked mushrooms, place 1 / 2 of chicken breast, one slice of swiss cheese, 2 slices of bacon, 1 / 2 chicken breast, top of roll, put on loose sweatpants --, eat !

refried beans are typically made from pinto beans, but black beans work well, too. add a dab of sour cream if you crave a little richness. recipe courtesy of gourmet magazine. I will tell you this nice dish - is called light refried black beans. and it shouldn't take more than 15 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 5 which are: garlic, corn oil, black beans, water, fresh cilantro. Follow this steps: cook garlic in oil in a skillet over moderate heat , stirring , until fragrant , about 1 minute, add beans with their liquid and mash with a potato masher or the back of a large spoon to make a coarse pure, continue to cook , stirring occasionally , until mixture is hot, stir in enough of water to thin to a creamy consistency, add pepper to taste, serve warm , sprinkled with cilantro, makes 4 servings

this recipe came from www.recipefortogetherness.com This course is called fat free pineapple carrot snack cake. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 60 minutes!. It is composed of 11 actions so it has many steps. You will need 14 ingredients which are: flour, cornstarch, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, ground ginger, ground cloves, crushed pineapple, brown sugar, egg whites, light corn syrup, carrot, powdered sugar. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 350f spray 8-inch square baking pan with cooking spray, in large bowl combine flour , corn starch , baking powder , baking soda , salt , cinnamon , ginger and cloves, set aside, in medium bowl with wire whisk or fork , stir pineapple and brown sugar 1 minute, blend in egg whites and corn syrup, gradually stir into flour mixture until smooth, stir in carrots, pour into prepared pan, bake 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, cool in pan on wire rack, sprinkle with powdered sugar

this is also good made with jumbo lump crabmeat, but  This course is baptized as schlobster lobster. and it won´t take more than 25 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: unsalted butter, flour, hot water, dry mustard, half-and-half, white wine, old bay seasoning, lobster meat. Follow this steps: in a saucepan , melt the butter over medium heat, blend in the flour and stir until well blended and bubbly , about 2 to 3 minutes, add the hot water , mustard and half and half, heat for about 1 to 2 minutes , stirring constantly, add the wine , old bay and lobster meat, stir until heated throughout, serve over puff pastry shells , toast points , or your favourite pasta

this is not your mama's slaw, this is a just right blend of lip puckering mouth warming goodness...and its a side dish !! This wonderful male is named sweet n spicy coleslaw. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 20 minutes!. The are 3 actions so it has few steps. The ingredients you will need are 10 which are: green cabbage, carrots, yellow onion, mayonnaise, mustard, apple cider vinegar, sugar, black pepper, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper. Do the following: quarter cabbage and remove core, grate the cabbage , carrots and onion in a food processor , then toss them in a large bowl, for dressing , whisk the remaining ingredients together , and toss with the vegetables , add salt and pepper and chill for two hours

this is from cooking light. i'm posting it before i loose it. zwt3 is coming soon. "complete the menu with steamed green beans, and packaged mixed baby greens tossed with bottled orange sections and toasted almonds. This platte is called quick vegetarian paella. and it shouldn't take more than 35 minutes. The are 8 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 16 ingredients which are: olive oil, onions, green bell peppers, sliced mushrooms, garlic cloves, quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable broth, water, saffron threads, dried thyme, tomatoes, peas, pimento stuffed olive, fresh parsley, black pepper, artichoke hearts. Follow this steps: heat olive oil in a stockpot over medium-high heat, add onion , bell pepper , mushrooms , and garlic, saute for 5 minutes, stir in rice , broth , water , saffron and thyme, bring to a boil, cover , reduce heat , and simmer for 10 minutes, stir in tomato , peas , olives , parsley , pepper and artichoke hearts, cook for 3 minutes or until rice is tender and mixture is heated through

a nice addition to a party!   serve with spicy dipping sauce (recipe#137788). I will tell you this nice dish - is called corn and crab fritters. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 23 minutes!. The are 15 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 16 which are: butter, shallots, garlic cloves, jalapeno peppers, frozen whole kernel corn, green onions, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, pepper, ground red pepper, eggs, buttermilk, fresh lump crabmeat, vegetable oil. You have to: melt butter in a large skillet, add vegetables , and saut 5 minutes, combine flour and next 5 ingredients in a large bowl, lightly beat egg yolks, add buttermilk to egg yolks, stir sauteed vegetables and buttermilk mixture into flour mixture, fold in crabmeat, beat egg whites at high speed until soft peaks form, gently fold half of beaten egg white into crabmeat batter, fold in remaining beaten egg white, heat 2" oil to 375, shape 2 tablespoons batter into a fritter shape and drop into hot oil 4 or 5 at a time, cook 3 minutes or until golden on all sides , turning once, drain on paper towels, serve with spicy dipping sauce

an extremely easy recipe. simply dump all the ingredients in and bake. don't fret, it still tastes good. I will tell you this nice dish - is called patriotic dump cake. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 45 minutes!. The number of actions are 2 so it has few steps. You will need 5 ingredients which are: cherry pie filling, fresh blueberries, white cake mix, butter, nuts. You have to: in a 9x12" greased pan , layer the ingredients in the order listed, bake at 325f for 45 minutes

when my cousin, claudia, visits from arizona i have to make these for her. the addition of beer in them makes them extra creamy and soft on the inside.i know it's not a lot of beer and i've been known to drink the rest of the bottle just so it doesn't go to waste-makes for a nice nap after breakfast lol. i love these potatoes and always cook two eggs, over medium, and put right on top of the potatoes and mix it all together. yum!! i aslo add cream cheese to my baked potatoes as well and it's just as good. hope you enjoy these as much as we do. I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as beer cheese fried potatoes. and it shouldn't take more than 35 minutes. It is composed of 7 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 6 ingredients which are: russet potatoes, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, beer, cream. Follow this steps: in 12 inch skillet on medium high heat , add oil and potatoes, season with salt and pepper, cook , flipping occasionaly until lightly brown, reduce heat to medium low and continue cooking untill potatoes are tender, add in beer and cover for about 3 minutes to allow alcohol to cook off, put dots of cream cheese across top of potatoes and cover again, when cream cheese begins to melt , remove from heat but leave covered for another minute or so

i made this for dinner last night and it was awesome. the baked breadcrumb topping mixture is to die for! recipe found on the internet. This recipe is baptized as rack of lamb. and it takes 30. It is composed of 9 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 7 ingredients which are: rack of lamb, vegetable oil, bread, fresh parsley, shallot, garlic, butter. Follow this steps: sear rack of lamb all over in skillet that can be used in the oven, with food processor running , drop shallot and garlic into top tube and process until finely minced, add parsley and process until finely chopped, add pieces of fresh bread and process to fine crumbs, remove from processor to a bowl and mix in melted butter, pat bread crumb mixture onto top of rack of lamb, roast at 450 for 15 to 20 minutes, if crumbs brown too quickly , turn oven down to 425, test with oven thermometer until done to your liking

add fruit to your dessert for a delicious ending to your meal!  serve this peach cobbler warm with your favorite ice cream or with whipped cream. I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as georgia peach cobbler. and it shouldn't take more than 40 minutes. The are 26 actions so it has many steps.
