nutritional yeast is a godsend for folks who are vegan or those dairy-intolerant. i think this recipe gives traditional caesar salad dressings a run for their money. nutritional yeast is available in bulk in well-stocked grocery stores. i forgot the recipe source!? This plat du jur is called vegan caesar salad dressing. and it shouldn't take more than 10 minutes. The are 6 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 9 which are: dijon mustard, nutritional yeast flakes, almonds, garlic cloves, water, lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, white pepper. Do the following: in a small bowl , combine the mustard , nutritional yeast , almonds , and garlic, make a paste, whisk in the water , lemon juice , soy sauce , olive oil and white pepper, i prefer to blend the ingredients together in a mini-blender or using a hand-held immersion blender for a creamier consistency, refrigerate until ready to serve, adjust seasonings if necessary

posting this for zwt 2006 (asian region), this is a nice change from traditional dinner rolls. the coconut milk adds a mildly sweet flavor to them. This plat du jur is named coconut milk yeast rolls. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 155 minutes!. The number of actions are 24 so it has many steps. You will need 8 ingredients which are: sugar, warm water, active dry yeast, coconut milk, milk, butter, salt, bread flour. Do the following: dissolve 1 teaspoon of sugar in 1 / 2 cup of warm water, sprinkle in the package of yeast, let it stand for 10 minutes and then stir, heat the milk to lukewarm , stirring occasionally, add in the butter , 3 tablespoons sugar , 2 teaspoons salt , and 1 / 2 cup warm water, add the heated milk mixture and 2 cups flour to the dissolved yeast mixture, beat until the mixture is smooth and elastic, gradually stir in the remaining 3 cups of flour , adding a bit more flour if necessary, the dough should be soft and easily leave the sides of the bowl, turn the dough out onto a floured surface and round it up into a ball, knead the dough until it is smooth , elastic and not sticky, again , add a bit more flour if necessary, place the dough in a lightly greased bowl, turn the dough so that the top is greased as well, cover with greased wax paper and a towel, let the dough rise in a warm place until it has doubled, preheat oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit, punch down to let the air out of the dough, turn it out onto a lightly floured board, use a wet knife to cut the dough in half , and then each half into thirds , and thirds again, this gives 18 buns, shape the buns into balls and place on a lightly greased baking dish such as a cookie sheet with sides, bake for 18 - 20 minutes, after removing the buns , use a pastry brush to lightly coat them with butter then slather with more butter and any other high calorie bad for you toppings you can think of and enjoy !

a fiery taste sensation for those who like it hot. This plat du jur is baptized as beef vindaloo   the hot one. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 60 minutes!. It is composed of 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 15 which are: stewing beef, onion, garlic cloves, nut oil, ginger, mustard seeds, white vinegar, chili powder, paprika, curry powder, chili flakes, chili peppers, coconut milk, salt, black pepper. You have to: place the beef in a bowl and add 2 teaspoons of the curry powder and 2 teaspoons of the chilli , make sure it is coated evenly and fully and leave in the fridge to marinate, roughly chop the onion , mince the garlic , mustard seed , ginger and vinegar together to form a paste, add the oil to a large oven ready pan and fry the onions , garlic / ginger paste and the chillis till the onion is soft , add in the all ingredients except for the meat and coconut milk and fry for a further 2 mins ensuring the onions and chillis are covered in the powdered ingredients, add the meat and fry gently for 10 minutes to seal the meat, add the coconut milk and stir , bring to a boil and simmer for roughly 10 minutes until suace begins to thicken, "transfer to the oven at 200c for 30 minutes stirring regularly to finish off", serve on pilau rice preferably with a lassi drink as thats the only thing that will cool your mouth down

fantastic with real maple syrup, nice and sweet dessert. This platte is called maple mousse. and it shouldn't take more than 150 minutes. It is composed of 13 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 5 which are: unflavored gelatin, orange juice, pure maple syrup, whipping cream, vanilla. Follow this steps: in a small saucepan , sprinkle gelatin over orange juice, let stand until dissolved, set over low heat, stir until gelatin is completely dissolved, stir in maple syrup, turn into a large bowl, refrigerate , stirring occationally , until the consistency of raw egg white, meanwhile , whip cream until soft peaks form, stir in vanilla, stir 1 / 4 of the cream into maple syrup, fold in the remaining cream, spoon into parfait glasses, chill until firmly set

This course is called mango avocado salad. and it shouldn't take more than 15 minutes. It is composed of 6 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 15 which are: lime, juice of, sherry wine vinegar, light soy sauce, peanut oil, chili pepper, ground coriander, chopped tomato, cilantro, basil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, mango, avocado, frisee, cashews. Follow this steps: mix lime , vinegar , soy , oil , chile , coriander , tomato , cilantro , basil , salt and pepper in a small bowl , set aside, peel and slice mangoes into 1 / 4-inch slices, do the same with the avocado, put the lettuce on an oval platter, lay the mango and avocado slices on top , alternating, pour dressing over and top with chopped cashews

quinoa is a fast-cooking, protein-packed whole grain. steamed, it makes a perfect partner for lime-spiked black beans and fresh tomato. I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as black bean and tomato quinoa salad. and it shouldn't take more than 30 minutes. It is composed of 8 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 10 ingredients which are: lime zest, fresh lime juice, unsalted butter, vegetable oil, sugar, quinoa, black beans, tomatoes, scallions, fresh cilantro. Do the following: whisk together lime zest and juice , butter , oil , sugar , 1 / 2 teaspoon salt , and 1 / 4teaspoon pepper in a large bowl, wash quinoa in 3 changes of cold water in a bowl , draining in a sieve each time, cook quinoa in a medium pot of boiling salted water , uncovered , until almost tender , about 10 minutes, drain in sieve , then set sieve in same pot with 1 inch of simmering water, cover quinoa with a folded kitchen towel , then cover sieve with a lid and steam over medium heat until tender , fluffy , and dry , about 10 minutes, remove pot from heat and remove lid, let stand , still covered with towel , 5 minutes, add quinoa to dressing and toss until dressing is absorbed , then stir in remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste

fresh herbs with a touch of lemon zest and you have a gorgeous meal.
serve with your favourite rice pilaf and a green salad.
use your favourite fish fillet. This recipe is called herb crusted fish. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 25 minutes!. The number of actions are 9 so it has quite few steps. Is made of 8 ingredients which are: dry breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, fresh oregano, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, salt and pepper, cod, olive oil. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 400 degrees f, place the bread crumbs in a shallow dish, on a cutting board place the herbs , garlic , lemon zest , and a little salt, finely chop all together, add the herb mixture to the bread crumbs, brush the top of each fillet with olive oil and dip in to the bread crumb herb mixture, brush baking pan with oil, place the fillets , crumb side up, bake in oven for 12-15 minutes or until fish is done and flaky

very nice with your afternoon tea, but tasty any time.  from the new england chapter of the united states regional cookbook, culinary arts institute of chicago, 1947. I will tell you this nice dish - is called tea dainties. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 27 minutes!. It is composed of 6 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 6 which are: eggs, light brown sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts. You have to: preheat oven to 350f and lightly grease cookie sheets, beat eggs and add brown sugar, sift flour , baking powder and salt together, add to egg mixture and blend thoroughly, add walnuts, drop from teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheet , 1 / 2" apart and bake for 12 minutes

a great side dish to pair up with beef, chicken or fish.  love the flavors in this dish - simple but full of flavor. i did add a clove of garlic to the original recipe just because i thought it would really give it a great background flavor. tried and posted for zwt7. This wonderful male is called sauteed zucchini with sun dried tomatoes. and it shouldn't take more than 22 minutes. The are 11 actions so it has many steps. You will need 6 ingredients which are: extra virgin olive oil, zucchini, sun-dried tomatoes, onion, garlic clove, salt and pepper. You have to: wash the zucchini using a brush to gently scrub the zucchini and then pat dry with a kitchen towel, cut off the stems and cut each zucchini in 3 or 4 pieces, then cut each piece lengthwise into 6 wedges, set to the side, chop the dried tomatoes and set to the side, in a large saut pan , over medium heat , place 4 tablespoons of oil and the diced onion, cook over a medium heat until the sliced onions are translucent , for about 4 minutes , stirring occasionally, add the minced garlic and saut an additional 1 minute, add the dried tomato and saut for additional 2 minutes, add the zucchini , salt and pepper to taste , then cover with a tight lid and simmer for additional 5 minutes or until tender but firm, using a slatted spoon transfer the zucchini into a large dish and serve while hot

delicious, healthy, ice cream in a bag! This course is called ice cream in a bag. and it takes 15. It is composed of 5 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 6 ingredients which are: heavy cream, sugar, vanilla, ice cubes, salt, ziploc bag. You have to: first put the heavy cream / whipping cream , sugar , and vanilla in the small ziploc bag and mix, then place the ice and salt in the larger ziploc bag, place the small ziploc bag inside the large bag, then you knead and shake the bag for approximately 10 minutes or until ice cream inside is thickened, last remove the smaller bag from larger bag and enjoy !

this recipe was found online & is included here to be taken with me on the zaar world tour 5. This recipe is named portuguese chicken soup. and it won´t take more than 60 minutes. It is composed of 6 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 11 which are: chicken breast, onion, fresh parsley, lemon zest, of fresh mint, chicken stock, thin egg noodles, fresh mint leaves, salt, white pepper, fresh lemon juice. Do the following: in a large saucepan , add chicken breast , onion , parsley , zest & mint sprig , & simmer until done , about 35 minutes, remove the breast & let it cool before stripping off the meat & cutting it into a julienne, strain the broth , then return it to the ot & bring it to a boil, add pasta & chopped mint , season to taste with salt & white pepper , then heat until pasta is cooked al dente, remove from heat , stir in lemon juice & julienned chicken, ladle into soup bowls & enjoy !

i adopted this recipe...will try soon!:) This course is baptized as basmati chaaval. and it won´t take more than 0 minutes. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. You will need 4 ingredients which are: basmati rice, salt, unsalted butter, water. Follow this steps: pick the rice over and put in a bowl, wash in several changes of water, drain, pour 3 times the water you have rice over the rice and let soak for 30 minutes hour, drain thoroughly, combine the rice , salt , butter and the water in a pot, bring to a boil, cover with a tight fitting lid , turn heat to very low and cook for 20 minutes, lift the lid , mix gently but quickly with a fork and cover again, cook for 5-10 minutes until tender

this is the basic recipe for cooking quinoa. you can use it in place of rice, or you can use it as the basis of a salad or tabouleh. quinoa is a light and wholesome grain that is gluten free. it is prepared quickly and easily with this basic method. this recipe makes 3 cups of cooked quinoa This platte is called basic quinoa. and it shouldn't take more than 20 minutes. The are 5 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 2 which are: water, quinoa. Follow this steps: wash the quinoa with water , using a strainer, same as you would wash rice, place quinoa and water in a 1 1 / 2 quart / medium sized saucepan , bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer , cover , and cook until all of the water is absorbed, you will know that the quinoa is done when all the grains have turned from white to transparent , and the spiral-like germ has separated

i found this on another website and this is superfantabulous yummy. my husband had never had perogies before (i know, such a sheltered life) and he absolutely loved this, my kiddos cleared their plates as well!! yum!! This plat du jur is named lazy perogies. and it shouldn't take more than 90 minutes. The number of actions are 22 so it has many steps. Is made of 11 ingredients which are: lasagna noodles, baking potatoes, milk, butter, onion powder, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, onion, cottage cheese, egg. Follow this steps: fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil, once the water is boiling , stir in the lasagna noodles , about 3 or 4 at a time , and return to a boil, cook the noodles uncovered , stirring occasionally , until the pasta has cooked through but is still firm to the bite , about 10 minutes per batch, drain well in a colander set in the sink , and lay the cooked noodles flat on waxed paper or aluminum foil while you finish cooking the rest of the noodles, preheat oven to 350 degrees f, grease a 9x11-inch baking dish, place the potatoes into a large pot and cover with water, bring to a boil over high heat , then reduce heat to medium-low , cover , and simmer until tender , about 20 minutes, drain and allow to steam dry for a minute or two, using a potato masher , mash the potatoes with the milk and butter until smooth, stir in 1 teaspoon of onion salt , and season with salt and pepper, set the mashed potatoes aside to cool, when cooled , mix with shredded cheddar cheese, place the bacon in a large , deep skillet , and cook over medium-high heat , turning occasionally , until evenly browned and almost crisp , about 10 minutes, place the onion into the hot bacon fat , and cook and stir until the onion is translucent , about 8 minutes, break the bacon into pieces with a spoon or spatula , and set the bacon and onion aside, mix the cottage cheese , egg , and 1 teaspoon of onion salt in a bowl, to make the casserole , place 3 lasagna noodles into the prepared baking dish , and spread with the cottage cheese mixture in an even layer, top the cottage cheese with 3 more lasagna noodles , then spread potato-cheese mixture in a layer, top the mashed potato layer with 3 more noodles , then spread the bacon and onion into an even layer on top of the casserole, cover the casserole with aluminum foil , and bake in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted and the casserole is hot , about 30 minutes, allow to set for about 10 minutes before serving

a creamy chilled version of borscht that is the perfect starter for summer meals. this reminds me of my polish grandmother's version of a clear beet broth with sliced fresh cooked beets topped with sour cream. This recipe is named chilled cream of beet soup. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 15 minutes!. It is composed of 2 actions so it has few steps. Is made of 7 ingredients which are: sour cream, beet, onion, salt, tabasco sauce, lemon, fresh chives. Do the following: place all ingredients in a blender , blend until smooth and chill, serve in coffee or tea cups and garnish with a dab of sour cream and sprinkle with chives

found this in the summer issue of heart-healthy living magazine. prep time does not iclude marinating time. This recipe is called rosemary grilled chicken. and it won´t take more than 17 minutes. The are 10 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 9 which are: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime peel, lime juice, fresh rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper. Do the following: place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness, place in a resealable bag, place bag in a small bowl, in a small bowl combine lime peel , lime juice , rosemary , olive oil , sugar , garlic , and salt, seal bag , turning to coat chicken, refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours , turning occasionally, remove chicken from marinade, discard marinade, season chicken with black pepper, grill over medium coals uncovered , turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink

enriched with two kinds of cheeses, this baked pasta showcases favorite summer vegetables at their seasonal best, including sweet corn, zucchini and fresh tomatoes. july 2009 williams-sonoma. This plat du jur is named baked penne with corn  zucchini and basil. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 90 minutes!. It is composed of 25 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 16 which are: kosher salt, penne, olive oil, corn, fresh ground black pepper, zucchini, yellow onion, tomatoes, garlic, fresh oregano, red pepper flakes, tomato paste, white wine, fresh basil, mozzarella cheese, parmigiano-reggiano cheese. Follow this steps: preheat an oven to 400f, bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat, generously salt the water , add the pasta and cook , stirring occasionally , until al dente , about 8 minutes, drain the pasta and rinse under cold running water, set aside, in a 12-inch nonstick fry pan over medium-high heat , warm 3 tbs, of the olive oil, add the corn , season with salt and black pepper and cook , stirring occasionally , until the corn is lightly golden , 6 to 8 minutes, transfer to a large bowl, set aside, return the pan to medium-high heat and warm the remaining 3 tbs, olive oil, working in batches , add the zucchini , season with salt and cook , stirring occasionally , until the zucchini is tender and golden brown , 6 to 8 minutes, add to the bowl with the corn, repeat with the remaining zucchini , adding more oil to the pan as needed, set the pan over medium-low heat, add the onion , 1 teaspoons salt and black pepper , to taste, cook , stirring occasionally , until the onion is translucent , about 2 minutes, stir in the tomatoes , garlic , oregano and red pepper flakes and cook , stirring occasionally , until the tomatoes soften and begin to form a sauce , about 5 minutes, stir in the tomato paste and cook for 1 minute, add the wine and cook until the wine has reduced and the sauce is fairly thick , about 3 minutes more, add the pasta , tomato sauce , basil , mozzarella and half of the parmigiano-reggiano to the bowl with the vegetables and stir to combine, transfer to the fry pan and sprinkle the remaining parmigiano-reggiano on top, transfer the pan to the oven and bake until golden brown on top , 20 to 25 minutes, serve warm

from vegetarian times february 2010. this soup boasts a smooth texture and a deep, rich flavor that comes from slow-roasting bell peppers. it's also high in beta-carotene and lycopene, two antioxidants that may help prevent cardiovascular disease. nutrition facts: 101 cal, 2g protein, 5g fat, 14g carb, 0mg cholesterol, 418mg sodium, 2.5g fiber, 6g sugar. This plat du jur is called red pepper carrot soup. and it shouldn't take more than 105 minutes. The are 12 actions so it has many steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: red bell peppers, olive oil, curry powder, bay leaf, onion, carrots, garlic cloves, salt, lemon juice. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 350f place bell peppers on baking sheet , and roast 1 hour , or until skin is wrinkled and blackened all over , turning peppers occasionally with tongs, transfer to bowl , and cover with plastic wrap 10 minutes to steam, when peppers are cool enough to handle , rub off blackened peel , and remove seeds, heat oil in 2-qt saucepan over medium heat, add curry powder and bay leaf , and stir 10 seconds, add onion , carrots , garlic , and salt, cover , and cook 10 minutes , or until onion is translucent, add 4 cups water , and bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low , and simmer , covered , 25 minutes, transfer carrot mixture to blender , add bell peppers , and puree until smooth, stir in lemon juice, garnish servings with bell pepper slices , if using

for perfect results plan ahead the steaks must be brought down to almost room temperature which might take several hours, this recipe works perfectly for beef tenderloin steaks of coarse you may use it for any cut of beef,  cooking times stated is for an 8-ounce steak at 1-1/2 inch thick --- i use montreal steak spice for this but freshly ground coarse black pepper will work fine, and you may adjust the black pepper to taste, since salt will draw out the juices from the beef do not salt until after cooking --- since not all cuts of meat are the same, for this method a more tender cut of steak is suggested to use such a strip loin etc. This dish is called kittencal s perfect pan fried steak. and it shouldn't take more than 186 minutes. The number of actions are 8 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 5 which are: boneless beef steaks, vegetable oil, steak spice, butter, salt. Do the following: in a bowl combine 3 tablespoons oil with 2 teaspoons steak seasoning or ground black pepper, rub both steaks with the oil / pepper mixture, allow the steaks to sit out to almost room temperature, heat a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat, quickly sear the meat about 5 seconds on each side, remove from the skillet to a plate, add 2 tablespoons butter to the hot skillet allow to sizzle and brown , then return the meat to the skillet and fry 4-5 minutes per side, remove steaks from the skillet and allow to stand for 5 minutes to allow the juice to settle

This recipe is called golden peach muffins. and it shouldn't take more than 45 minutes. The number of actions are 7 so it has quite few steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, ground cinnamon, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, peaches. Follow this steps: in a bowl , combine the dry ingredients, in another bowl , combine the eggs , oil and vanilla, stir into dry ingrediants just until moistened, fold in peaches, fill paper-lined muffin cups two-thirds full, bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean, cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack

this is my version of my favorite dish from the "blue ben dinner" in bennington vermont, (my home town) it's healthy and low carb all in one! This course is baptized as the garden scramble. and it takes 17. The are 6 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: eggs, margarine, onion, red bell pepper, mushroom, frozen spinach, frozen broccoli florets, monterey jack cheese, salsa. You have to: thaw frozen veggies in a bowl in the microwave for 2 minutes, in a large fry pan , melt margrine on high and saute onion , red bell pepper , and mushrooms for about 2 minutes, add the spinach and cook 1 minute or until the water is gone, add the broccoli and eggs , stir until eggs are done, remove from heat and sprinkle cheese on top, top with salsa and serve

a recipe my sister in law from ky gave me this recipe.i am from southern indiana!sounds like a keeper! This plat du jur is baptized as smoky sausage   potato supper. and it takes 53. The number of actions are 13 so it has many steps. You will need 7 ingredients which are: smoked sausage, butter, green onion, frozen hash browns, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese. Do the following: cut 1 / 2 pound sausage into 1 in, pieces, cut remaining sausage into thirds, slice partially through, researve for garnish, melt butter in skillet , saute onion 3 minutes or until tender, in a large mixing bowl , combine sausage , hashbrowns , and onion, mix well, add remaining ingredients except 1 / 2 cup grated cheese, spoon into 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish, top with sausage thirds, sprinkle remaining cheese around border, bake in a preheted oven 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes

a warm tex-mex dip for bread, natchos or corn chips... This recipe is baptized as tex mex fondue. and it takes 30. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 9 which are: onion, black pepper, butter, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, tabasco sauce, flour, heavy cream, cheddar cheese. You have to: melt the butter in the fondue pot at medium heat, cook the onion until golden, pepper to taste, add tomatoes and simmer over low heat until the liquid is reduced, add chili peppers and tabasco sauce, mix the flour and butter and mix into the tomato mixture, stir in the cream and mix well, add the cheese and stir until melted, avoid boiling at this point , boiling will cause the sauce to separate, things to dip: chunks of bread , breadsticks , natcho chips , corn chips

i made this up one day then mom decided she needed the recipe.  so here it is in print.  it's a beautiful dish.  feel free to substitute different spices for the curry powder - just please tell me what you used & how it turned out!  i substituted ras el hanout & it was yummy.  can be made vegan by using 2tb olive oil & eliminating the butter. I will tell you this nice dish - is called my couscous salad. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 12 minutes!. The are 11 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 9 which are: olive oil, butter, onion, salt, dried cranberries, curry powder, vegetable broth, couscous, baby spinach leaves. Do the following: melt butter with the oil in large saucepan, saute onion briefly, add salt , dried cranberries & curry powder, cook , stirring , until onions are softened, add broth & bring to a boil, stir in couscous, remove from heat, cover & let stand 5 minutes, stir in spinach , cover & let stand additional 2 minutes, "this wilts the spinach but doesnt cook it", fluff with a fork & enjoy

a twist on an old favorite! This plat du jur is called scalloped sweet potatoes. and it shouldn't take more than 50 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 6 ingredients which are: sweet potatoes, cream, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, nutmeg, cheddar cheese. Follow this steps: place 2 cups cream in a pot to warm, add nutmeg, butter a gratin or casserole dish, layer sliced potatoes and cheese in casserole, salt and pepper each layer and finish with cheese on top, pour warm cream over top and place casserole on a baking sheet to protect oven from possible over bubbling, bake 30-35 minutes in 350 degree oven

a chicken with ultracrisp skin and a subtle lemon flavor. rumor has it that if you cook this for your boyfriend he will propose.. here's to hoping. :o) I will tell you this nice dish - is called engagement chicken. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 70 minutes!. It is composed of 13 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 5 which are: whole chickens, lemons, fresh lemon juice, kosher salt, ground black pepper. Follow this steps: place rack in upper third of oven and preheat to 400 degrees, wash chicken inside and out with cold water , remove the giblets , then let the chicken drain , cavity down , in a colander until it reaches room temperature pat dry with paper towels, pour lemon juice all over the chicken season with salt and pepper, prick the whole lemons three times with a fork and place deep inside the cavity, place the chicken breast-side down on a rack in a roasting pan , lower heat to 350 and bake uncovered for 15 minutes, remove from oven and turn it breast-side up, return it to oven for 35 minutes more, test for doneness - a meat thermometer inserted in the thigh should read 180 , or juices should run clear when chicken is pricked with a fork, continue baking if necessary, let chicken cool for a few minutes before carving, serve with juices, serve with boiled new potatoes tossed with olive oil and fresh chopped parsley and / or steamed asparagus with butter, enjoy

created for the lively lemon lovelies of zwt #8 our pub crawl is a gin crawl! come visit and have a drink here http://www.food.com/bb/viewtopic.zsp?t=377158
lemon balm or lemon grass can be used in place of the lemon verbena This wonderful male is baptized as lively lemon gin tonic. and it won´t take more than 5 minutes. The number of actions are 4 so it has few steps. The ingredients are 6 which are: lemon verbena leaves, ice, gin, fresh lemon juice, tonic water, syrup. You have to: in a cocktail shaker , muddle the leaves, add ice and the gin , lime juice and shake well, strain into an ice-filled balloon glass it will enhance all the aromas in the drink, wipe the rim with a slice of lemon , stir in the tonic , drizzle blueberry syrup for color and sweetness and garnish with the verbena leaf and lemon slice

handed down from my mom...always a winner when served! :) I will tell you this nice dish - is called kraft mac   cheese beef casserole. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 40 minutes!. It is composed of 11 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: macaroni and cheese mix, milk, butter, hunts tomato sauce, ground beef, mozzarella cheese, salt, pepper. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 375 degrees, while waiting for water to boil for mac & cheese --, cook ground beef until browned , do not drain, stir in tomato sauce w cooked beef , set aside, cook kraft mac & cheese according to directions, spray a 1, 5 qt dish with pam, mix cooked kraft mac & cheese and ground beef w tomato mixture in dish, stir in 1 cup mozzarella cheese & cover top w remaining cheese, put uncovered dish in preheated 375 degree oven for 25-30 minute, after removing from oven , let rest for 5 min & serve your delicious casserole ! :)

this is the best angel food cake! i imagine it would also work well with other types of berries too - fresh, frozen or dried. be careful when separating the eggs, if you get one drop of yolk in the whites, it won't whip properly. This platte is baptized as scrumptious cranberry angel food cake. and it shouldn't take more than 65 minutes. The are 13 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 8 which are: cake flour, sugar, egg whites, vanilla extract, cream of tartar, salt, cranberries, orange zest. Do the following: preheat oven to 375 degrees f, clean and dry tube or bundt pan, stir together flour and 3 / 4 cup sugar , and set aside, in a large bowl , whip egg whites with vanilla , cream of tartar , and salt until medium stiff peaks form, gradually add remaining 3 / 4 cup sugar , and continue to whip until stiff peaks form, "batter will fill mixers bowl and appear very shiny", carefully fold in flour mixture , 1 / 3 of it at a time, carefully fold in cranberries and orange zest, pour batter evenly into pan, bake for 40 minutes , or until cake is light golden brown and springs back when lightly touched, invert pan over the top of a thin necked bottle and allow to cool completely, loosen cake by running a knife around the edges and center of the pan, invert onto a serving plate

once a month my brother's church has a casserole dinner and this was always one of my favorites.  now my family loves it too.  i love to make it because it is so simple and is actually healthy unlike a lot of convience meals you can buy at the store. This course is named potato corn casserole. and it shouldn't take more than 70 minutes. The number of actions are 8 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 5 which are: frozen french fries, ground beef, creamed corn, cream of celery soup, onion powder. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 375 degrees, grease sides of 9x13 baking dish, line bottom of baking dish with frozen french fries, brown hamburger with onion powder for flavor, mix meat with creamed corn and soup, pour meat mixture over fries, bake for 1 1 / 2 hours or until fries are tender, enjoy !

great easy recipe for brunch or even supper!
prep time does not include chilling time. This recipe is called easy cheese  n sausage strata. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 80 minutes!. It is composed of 12 actions so it has many steps. Is made of 7 ingredients which are: bulk pork sausage, sliced mushrooms, green onion, velveeta cheese, bread cubes, milk, eggs. Follow this steps: brown sausage , drain grease, add vegetables and continue cooking 5 minutes , drain if needed, set aside to cool 10 minutes, stir in velveeta and bread cubes, place in a greased 8" square baking dish, beat milk and eggs, pour over sausage mixture, cover , refrigerate several hours, preheat oven to 350, uncover strata and bake 50-55 minutes or until golden brown, let stand 10 minutes before serving, garnish with additional sliced green onions if desired

this is soooo good. my kids love it! This course is called root beer float cake. and it won´t take more than 55 minutes. It is composed of 11 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 5 which are: white cake mix, root beer, vegetable oil, eggs, "confectioners sugar". You have to: preheat oven to 350 degrees f, grease and flour a 10-inch bundt pan, in a medium bowl , combine cake mix , can of root beer , oil and eggs until smooth, pour into prepared pan, bake for 35-40 minutes, test for doneness, cool for 15 minutes, then turn out onto rack to cool completely, "to prepare the glaze: mix the confectioners sugar with the 3 tablespoons of root beer until smooth", poke holes with a skewer or wooden pick at 2 inch intervals and pour glaze over cake, perfection when served with vanilla ice cream

This recipe is named curried carrot bisque. and it won´t take more than 60 minutes. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 10 which are: butter, carrot, leeks, fresh ginger, garlic, curry powder, curry paste, chicken stock, whipping cream, salt & pepper. Follow this steps: heat butter over medium heat in pot, stir in carrots , leeks , ginger , garlic, and curry powder, saute for about 5 minutes or until leeks soften slightly, pour in chicken stock , bring to a boil , lower heat and simmer , covered , 20 ~ 25 minutes or until vegetables are tender, puree in a blender or food processor, return to heat , add whipping cream , salt and pepper and simmer for 5 minutes, garnish with grated carrot, serves 4 to 6, the globe and mail -----

preparation time does not include soaking time. my best friend, vadivu, sent this to me. i'm yet to try, it arrived in the post today n i wanted to share rightaway! This platte is baptized as fig and honey milk shake. and it takes 10. The are 8 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 6 ingredients which are: figs, milk, sugar, honey, cream, rose essence. Follow this steps: soak the figs in 1 cup of water for 4-5 hours, grind in a mixer till smooth, add the milk , sugar and honey, beat till frothy, add the cream and essence, beat again, serve ice cold !, yummy , enjoy !

i received this recipe in my e-mail from a friend that belongs to another site also.
these are mildly smoked and not salty at all in spite of the amount of sodium in the recipe.
very easy to make even easier to enjoy!
servings are 1/4 cup. This dish is called homemade smoked almonds. and it won´t take more than 45 minutes. The are 11 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 6 which are: egg white, garlic powder, celery salt, salt, liquid smoke flavoring, whole unblanched almonds. Follow this steps: in a bowl , whisk egg white until foamy, add garlic powder , celery salt , salt and liquid smoke, stir until blended, add almonds and stir until well coated, evenly spread almonds in a 15-in, x 10-in, x 1-in, baking pan coated with nonstick cooking spray, bake at 300 degrees f for 30 minutes , stirring every 10 minutes, cool, store in an airtight container

these are found basically everywhere on okinawa, very thick and hearty little doughnut balls! got this off a local okinawan recipe site. This course is baptized as sata andagi  okinawan doughnuts. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 40 minutes!. The are 8 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: oil, eggs, milk, vanilla, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt. You have to: in a deep fryer or deep skillet , heat oil to 350 f or until hot, in a large bowl , beat eggs , milk , and vanilla, sift flour , sugar , baking powder and salt, add to egg mixture, stir until dry ingredients are moistened and dough is smooth, drop teaspoonfuls of dough into the hot oil, fry until golden brown and doughnuts rise to the surface, drain on paper towel lined plates and serve hot , but they are also good cooled down , you can buy them either way there on okinawa !

another brazilian recipe. this is my choice for dessert, as it's simple!!!! i will serve this with fresh or poached fruit. This plat du jur is called coconut egg pie  quindim. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 40 minutes!. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. You will need 5 ingredients which are: granulated sugar, coconut, butter, egg yolks, egg white. You have to: preheat your oven to 350f, in the bowl of your electric mixer , combine the sugar , coconut and butter, gradually add the egg yolks , one at a time, lastly , fold in the beaten egg white, pour the mixture into a 9-inch pie plate, place this in a roasting pan and fill with boiling water to half way up the pie dish, bake for 30 minutes or until set and golden brown, turn the pie out on a serving dish, you want to present it upside down, refrigerate

this is also very good as leftovers. time does not include marinating time (1-24 hours) I will tell you this nice dish - is baptized as puerto rican style roast pork shoulder. and it takes 185. It is composed of 9 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 8 ingredients which are: garlic cloves, onion, oregano leaves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, peanut oil, wine vinegar, pork shoulder. You have to: mix the garlic , onion , oregano , salt , and pepper in a food processor , adding the oil in a drizzle and scraping down the sides as necessary, blend in the vinegar, rub the mixture well onto the pork , getting into every nook and cranny, place the meat on a rack and let sit , uncovered , for 1-24 hours, refrigerate if it is hot or the meat will be set out for longer than 2 hours, preheat the oven to 350f roast about 3 hours , turning every 30 minutes until well done , tender , and the skin is crisp, the internal temperature should be between 150f-160f do not allow to go higher than 160f, let the meat rest for 10-15 minutes before cutting, the meat will be very tender and almost impossible to cut into uniform slices , so just cut it into chunks

when i was growing up on the farm my mother would make all kinds of potato dishes as they had plenty from their gardens  but this one dish seemed to be the most asked for. This dish is called potato smother. and it won´t take more than 50 minutes. The are 13 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients you will need are 6 which are: potatoes, onions, all-purpose white flour, salt & fresh ground pepper, salt pork, water. Do the following: in a dutch oven , over med, high heat saute salt pork or bacon until crisp, then start your layers, potatoes, onions, 1 tbs, flour, salt / pepper to taste, repeat layers, then add just enough water to come to half-way, cover and cook on medium heat until potatoes are done, it will make its own creamy like gravy, good with meatloaf , etc

a recipe from ricardo. This wonderful male is baptized as lentils and red pepper dip. and it takes 35. It is composed of 10 actions so it has many steps. You will need 7 ingredients which are: red bell peppers, garlic cloves, olive oil, chicken stock, red lentil, lemon juice, salt and pepper. You have to: in a skillet , softened bell peppers and garlic in oil, add salt and pepper, add chicken stock , lentils and lemon juice, bring to boil, cover and let simmer about 15 minutes or until lentils are tender, in a food processor , reduce in a creamy puree, adjust seasoning, let cool, cover and refrigerate until cold, serve as a dip with grilled pita bread , veggies or as a garnish for sandwiches

this recipe was featured in my local paper, the virginian-pilot, on october 7, 2009. these cookies won 2nd place in the chocolate chip cookie division during the 2009 virginia state fair. they were submitted by francie rayburn of virginia beach, va. This recipe is named deluxe pecan chocolate chip cookies. and it won´t take more than 65 minutes. It is composed of 13 actions so it has many steps. The ingredients are 10 which are: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, crisco shortening, brown sugar, eggs, hot sauce, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate morsels, pecans. Follow this steps: preheat oven to 375 degrees, in a small bowl , combine flour , baking soda and salt, set aside, in another bowl , combine crisco and brown sugar, beat until light and creamy, add eggs , hot sauce and vanilla extract, beat until light and fluffy, gradually blend in flour mixture, stir in morsels and pecans, drop by well-rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets, bake for 10 to 12 minutes, allow to stand 2 to 3 minutes before removing from cookie sheets, cool

i promised my daughter i could make yummy brownies without a box mix! when i went looking for a recipe, i wanted  I will tell you this nice dish - is called chewy oatmeal brownies. and it takes 35. The number of actions are 6 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 10 which are: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, cocoa, baking powder, salt, oats, nuts. Follow this steps: combine sugar , eggs and vanilla with a fork, combine dry ingredients in separate bowl, mix wet and dry ingredients together well with fork, stir in nuts, spread batter evenly in a greased 8 x 8 pan, bake at 350 degrees for 30 minututes

try this recipe as a marinade for the jamaican grilled chicken wings.  recipe courtesy of bahama breeze's restaurant. This recipe is called jamaican marinade. and it shouldn't take more than 10 minutes. It is composed of 5 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 12 ingredients which are: olive oil, jamaican jerk spice, orange juice, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, dark jamaican rum, lime, scotch bonnet pepper, garlic cloves, red onion, green onions, creole seasoning. Do the following: slowly add the olive oil to the jerk seasoning stirring with a wire whisk, then add all remaining ingredients, stir, refrigerate, makes 1 cups marinade , enough to marinate about 12 servings

this is so versatile and the leftovers are great for work the next day. i sometimes use black olives or green olives. whatever you like. This course is baptized as summer spaghetti. and it won´t take more than 15 minutes. The are 3 actions so it has few steps. The ingredients are 14 which are: spaghetti, green olives, bell pepper, garlic cloves, english cucumber, dried oregano, feta cheese, red onion, tomatoes, white beans, olive oil, red wine vinegar, fresh basil, salt and pepper. Do the following: combine all the veggies and beans in a big bowl, adds the herbs , garlic , some salt and pepper, drizzle with olive oil

a delicious and creamy side that goes with almost anything, like pita chips, lavash bread, ruffled potato chips, or basmati rice. from my persian kitchen. This course is called mast o musir   persian yogurt dip with shallots. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 5 minutes!. It is composed of 3 actions so it has few steps. You will need 3 ingredients which are: shallot, plain nonfat yogurt, greek yogurt. Do the following: finely dice your shallot, in a bowl , mix the yogurts and shallots thoroughly, cover and place in the fridge 2 to 3 hours

from madhur jaffrey's indian cooking.  i've been vegetarian on and off, so i'm not sure if i've ever tried this, but my husband *loves* it.  ***cayenne & paprika*** you can combine them in any amount you like, as long as you use a total of 1 1/2 tablespoons.  (i usually just use a little bit of cayenne and a lot of paprika, so the kids can eat it too.)  i use chicken legs (because they are cheap) and the marinade covers about 10 legs. This dish is named spicy baked chicken  from india     masaledar murghi. and it won´t take more than 235 minutes. The number of actions are 9 so it has quite few steps. You will need 10 ingredients which are: cumin, paprika, cayenne, turmeric, fresh ground black pepper, salt, garlic cloves, lemon juice, chicken pieces, vegetable oil. Follow this steps: combine cumin , paprika , cayenne , turmeric , black pepper , salt , garlic , and lemon juice in a bowl and mix, rub this mixture over the chicken pieces , including into flaps and along leg bones, place the pieces in a shallow baking dish , cover with plastic wrap , and set aside for at least 3 hours, preheat oven to 400f and brush the tops of the chicken pieces with oil, bake 20 minutes, turn the pieces over and bake another 25 minutes or until tender, baste the chicken with drippings 3 or 4 times, if there is sauce remaining after baking , pour it into a small pot and boil until somewhat reduced, arrange chicken on a platter and pour the reduced sauce over them

i adapted an old-fashioned recipe to use with splenda. it turned out very good! This plat du jur is named splenda pink lemonade. and it takes 5. It is composed of 3 actions so it has few steps. You will need 4 ingredients which are: water, fresh lemon juice, cranberry juice, splenda sugar substitute. Follow this steps: combine all ingredients in a large pitcher, garnish with mint leaves and orange or lemon slices, serve over ice

i have always loved this recipe. you can stir in nuts or chocolate chips if you want, though i love the pure, simple, maple flavor as is. now i have made it gluten-free, and it is still amazing (no one knows). can substitute two cups of any gluten-free flour for the mixture of three flours i have here. This plat du jur is baptized as gluten free blonde brownies. and it shouldn't take more than 40 minutes. It is composed of 5 actions so it has quite few steps. You will need 10 ingredients which are: rice flour, tapioca flour, cornstarch, salt, baking powder, baking soda, brown sugar, eggs, oil, vanilla. Do the following: grease a 13x9" pan, preheat oven to 350f, mix together flours , cornstarch , salt , baking powder , and baking soda in a small bowl, mix together remaining ingredients in a larger bowl , then stir in the dry ingredients, spread batter into pan , and bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown and done in the center

from quick cooking This plat du jur is named ranch turkey pasta dinner. and it won´t take more than 25 minutes. The are 9 actions so it has quite few steps. Is made of 6 ingredients which are: penne pasta, butter, ranch dressing mix, frozen peas and carrot, cooked turkey, parmesan cheese. Do the following: cook pasta according to package directions, meanwhile , in a large skillet , melt butter, stir in salad dressing mix until smooth, heat through, add peas and carrots, cook and stir for 2-3 minutes, drain pasta and add to skillet, stir in turkey and heat through, to each serving top with 1 / 4 cup parmesan cheese

normally my family balks at healthy recipes, but my husband was coming back for more of these, and today finished them off (so much for my evening dessert!). i'm posting this to keep handy for myself. This platte is baptized as healthiest lemon squares. and it shouldn't take more than 53 minutes. The number of actions are 9 so it has quite few steps. You will need 10 ingredients which are: whole wheat flour, oat bran, sugar, sea salt, whole almond, unsalted butter, eggs, lemon, rind of, fresh lemon juice, baking powder. You have to: preheat oven to 350f for base: chop almonds very fine, mix dry ingredients , and cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse meal, press into 8x8 pan coated with cooking spray, bake 18 minutes, for topping: beat all ingredients on high for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy, pour over baked base, bake 20 minutes, cool, dust with powdered sugar

from mr. food's quick & easy diabetic cooking I will tell you this nice dish - is called diabetic creamy mushroom soup. and it won´t take more than 25 minutes. The are 7 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 7 which are: fresh mushrooms, reduced-sodium chicken broth, onion powder, black pepper, low-fat milk, all-purpose flour, browning sauce. Follow this steps: coat a soup pot with nonstick cooking spray , add the mushrooms and saute over high heat for 4 to 5 minutes or until soft, stirring frequently, add the chicken broth , onion powder , and pepper, bring to a boil , then reduce the heat to medium-low, in a small bowl , mix the milk and flour until smooth, gradually add to the soup , stirring constantly, stir in the browning and seasoning sauce and simmer for 5 more minutes or until thickened

this is adapted from my 365 ways to cook pasta cookbook. This plat du jur is baptized as pasta spirals with shrimp peas and tomatoes. and it won´t take more than 25 minutes. The number of actions are 10 so it has many steps. You will need 9 ingredients which are: olive oil, shrimp, scallion, garlic clove, tomatoes, dried basil, spiral shaped pasta, peas, salt and pepper. Do the following: heat oil in a medium skillet, add shrimp and saut over high heat , stirring , until pink and tender , about 3 minutes, stir in scallion and garlic, add tomato and sprinkle with oregano, cover and set aside, meanwhile , cook the pasta in plenty of boiling salted water until al dente , about 10 minutes, add of the pasta water to the shrimp mixture, drain pasta, toss pasta , shrimp mixture and peas, season with salt and pepper to taste

wonderful alternative to the sour cream chip dips.  tangy, and very simple to make. everyone will love it. This wonderful male is called aunt ceil s chip dip. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 10 minutes!. The number of actions are 4 so it has few steps. You will need 5 ingredients which are: cream cheese, chili sauce, miracle whip, worcestershire sauce, onion. Follow this steps: soften cream cheese, stir remaining ingredients into cream cheese until smooth and creamy with small bits of onion, store in an air tight container in refrigerator until firm, serve with potato chips or any other chip of your choice

these rolls are a wonderful addition to any holiday meal. times listed does not include rising time. This platte is named gina s cheesy rolls. and it won´t take more than 25 minutes. The number of actions are 6 so it has quite few steps. The ingredients are 4 which are: plastic wrap, cooking spray, white dinner rolls, shredded cheddar cheese. Do the following: spray a 12ct muffin pan with cooking spray, place 2 rolls standing upright into each muffin slot, spray saran wrap with cooking spray then cover the rolls, let rise until twice the size, preheat the oven to 350f then bake for 10-15 minutes, top with the cheese then bake for another 5 minutes

i love rachel ray's cooking show. i got this off foodnetwork.com website. enjoy! This recipe is baptized as italian club finger sandwiches. and it won´t take more than 15 minutes. The are 9 actions so it has quite few steps. The ingredients you will need are 8 which are: white bread, herb cheese spread, prosciutto di parma, arugula, plum tomatoes, salt, radishes, toothpick. Follow this steps: trim all crusts from bread, spread 4 slices with herb soft cheese, top each cheese covered slice with 2 slices each of prosciutto , 3 leaves of arugula , thinly sliced tomatoes seasoned with a pinch of salt, place a completed layer a top another , making 2 stacks each 2 layers high, set the final trimmed bread slices in place , making 2 triple-decker sandwiches, thinly slice and salt the radishes, pierce a couple of thin slices of radish on each toothpick as you place 4 toothpicks in each sandwich, cut each sandwich into 4 equal parts , cutting the sandwich across evenly on each side, the yield will be 8 triple-decker , square-shaped , "club" finger sandwiches , 2 per portion

delicious but with a sweet flair that you'll fall in love with!  this will hit the spot and satisfy your craving for a chunky, sweet, peppery, crunchy style sandwich. full of texture and flavor, it's a hearty salad that will comfort you and leave you feeling completely satisfied. this can be served as a traditional or open faced sandwich. or simply serve on a bed of lettuce and skip the bread. i use regular mayo when i don't have vegan. from the simple veganista. This platte is named cranberry walnut chickpea salad sandwich. and don´t be lazy it won´t take more than 30 minutes!. The are 17 actions so it has many steps. You will need 13 ingredients which are: garbanzo beans, celery, dried cranberries, walnuts, scallion, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, tahini, cider vinegar, water, pure maple syrup, lettuce, bread. Follow this steps: start by mixing your dressing, in a small bowl combine tahini / mayo , vinegar , water and maple syrup, set aside so the flavors come together, this can be made a day or two ahead and stored in the refrigerator until ready to use, add a tad more water , or vinegar if your a vinegar lover , to thin out dressing as desired, if using vegan mayo , you may like to add 2 more tablespoons, in a medium to large bowl , add your garbanzo beans and roughly mash with a strong fork or potato masher, add in celery , cranberries , nuts , scallions , salt , pepper and dressing , mix well, serve at room temp or let chill in the refrigerator for an hour before serving, serve on your favorite bread as a closed or open faced sandwich , or on a bed of leafy greens, you may even opt to simply enjoy the salad as is, add extra of anything you like , and vice versa if your not keen on an ingredient use less or omit !, change up the walnuts , using pecans , almonds , sunflower seeds , etc, if using sunflower seeds , use half the amount called for, for the dressing , if using vegan mayo , adjust accordingly adding more mayo as needed , maybe 1 / 2 cup instead of 1 / 3, i do recommend trying this reicpe with tahini -- it is seriously so good that you would never know and it is much better / cleaner for you than the store bought mayos !, enjoy !
